reviewText: Cheap looking and tbh, you should spend more on sunglasses. The coating on the glass is very important.

I got these glasses and loved the way they looked. I kept them in my purse, in the case that they came in. I only had them for 28 days, and wore them a total of 3 times, before they broke. They didn't experience any trauma, that I was aware of. I took them out of the case, to wear them for time # 4, and a piece of the plastic rim had chipped right off. It was the top inner left corner. I submitted a request for return, no problem. I am usually good about my returns, but this time life got hectic and I didn't get around to it for 12 days. By then, the opportunity to return had passed and I could not print the return label. So, into the garbage they went. I was so bummed. This product is nice in theory but, with only 3 wears for almost $20, I didn't even get what I paid for here. Really disappointed.
summary: Super Disappointing Product. Did Not Last :-(

I am the kind of person who loves going to the beach and skateboarding during sunny days, which is why sunglasses are essentials to me. I have used these sunglasses for a couple of times and these are some of the reasons why I think they deserve 5 stars: + Extremely lightweight wooden arms. + The shipping process was very quick and smooth. The box as easy to open, no knife needed. +They are unisex. + The hinges are made of stainless steel, which means that it will last as much as you want, because it is anti-corrosive. + The seller offers a 30 days warranty, meaning that if you did not like the sunglasses, just send it back and you'll receive your money. + The sunglasses come inside a carry case, which is hard in the outside, but the inside is made of some kind of soft microfiber. + The lens are polarized and offer 100% UVA/UVB protection, so your eyes will be protected from harmful rays. + A cleaning cloth is included as well, so you can keep the lens clear without scratching while cleaning them with your hands. + The arms are Woodies-labeled, and the inner part of the right one says "See you at the beach". Awesome detail Woodie USA! + 19.90 USD is a fair price for such a cool sunglasses. >What's included?< - WOODIES Zebra Wood Clubmaster Sunglasses with Polarized Lenses - Cleaning cloth - Guitar pick - Sunglasses carry case - Woodies' cartoon (watch the attached video to know what I mean) - Woodie-labeled silicone bracelet >These sunglasses were provided to me as a free sample or with a discount for review purposes. Hope my review was helpful and answered some of your questions.< Enjoy the video!

reviewText: Cute and fits well!

I really love the top, although the brown is lighter than I expected (not as dark as the model pics, but not as faded as the last pic). I have a really hard time finding swimsuit tops that fit me well and I'm comfortable in, but this one has to be my favorite. The straps can be criss-crossed in the back or straight, and they're adjustable. It provides enough support without feeling too small/tight. For size comparison, I normally wear a size 14/XL in regular clothes but ordered 16/XXL because I always have to size up for swimsuits. I'm very pleased with the fit.

The bottoms are ok, but I don't care much for how they look on me. The side ties are cute, but they draw extra attention to my hips which is totally unflattering for my shape. I'll probably wear the top with a black swim skirt more often than with these bottoms. Still, they're comfortable to swim in so I'm sure they'll get some use.

I received this item at a discount for evaluation and review.

This blouse by Face N Face is very versatile. It is cute and feminine but at the same time, professional looking. You can pair this top with different blazers, jackets, pants, and accessories, and come up with totally different styles and effects. That is probably what I like most about the blouse. I received this blouse for testing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased review after thorough evaluation and use.

The shirt itself is made of chiffon material and would be a great top for many occasions, both work and play. The material is not prone to wrinkling even after wash. The collar is round with a modest slit V. The blouse hugs your curves and then flares out at the bottom, which is quite appealing. The material is also slightly longer at the back. The cutest part of this blouse is the slightly puffed sleeves which give this blouse an additional feminine quality to it.

The design of the back of the top is okay, but Im a bit less excited about it. There is a modest hole in the back closed on the top by a single button. Im not sure I'm fond of this particular detail because it restricts your bra style choices. If you don't want people to get a peek of your bra from the back, you may have to wear a halter-style bra.  There is also a zipper than you can zip up, which I think is unnecessary since I can easily slide the whole blouse through without needing to unzip it. I think I would like it more if the back of the blouse were whole without the hole.

That being said, I still really like the style and versatility of the blouse overall despite the minor issues. The material is thin but completely opaque and is appropriate for every season and occasion. I found no loose threading or any kind of discrepancy with the sewing and quality of the blouse and the sizing seems to be true to size, though I did decide to order a size up because I prefer a looser fit blouse in general.
summary: Cute Chiffon Blouse with Slightly Puffed Sleeves and Flare

I thought I had ordered an XL but when I checked it was a L and they don't appear to make an XL - too bad as it is a great looking shirt and well made.  If it had fit I would have given it 5 stars - as it is I have to rate it at 2.

First, I received this shirt free for review. I recognize that a review of a free product is something fundamentally different from that of a product for which one has paid, but I do believe that such reviews can be useful when the process is respected and I've tried to do that here.

Appearance: Plaid pattern with a slim fit. 3/4 sleeve with rolled up look highlighted by a button with faux nacre.  Plad pattern heavy on reds and blues but does have a gold that pops in the right light.  Shoulder pads give a squared off look at shoulder.

Build: Plaid pattern is consistent and sleeves and collar are symmetrical.  All buttons all functional and none of the stitching flaws that sometimes plague value priced clothing are present here. Material is a 75/25 Polyester/Cotton.

Fit: True to size for my wife. She finds the shirt has both a tactile comfort as well as a pleasing fit that allows full range of motion of the arms. The Poly/Cotton blend combined with the slim fit cut makes this a form flattering shirt narrowing at the lower torso then flaring out over the hips slightly.

Anything else of note?:
-At the posting of this review, the shirt is eligible for free shipping to members of Amazon Prime; always a plus in my book.
-Free returns

Any negatives?: Those unfamiliar with this style may feel the shirt could use one extra button. The lowest (5th) button lands right around the navel on my wife.

Bottom line: A well made and comfortable shirt with a form flattering slim fit.

reviewText:
I really wanted to like these socks. They're comfortable and fit nicely. But they don't quite measure up, unfortunately.

I confess that I have been wearing socks with "nubbies" on the bottom lately in an effort to walk "barefoot" around my house while keeping my toes warm, and I actually thought "non slip" was referencing not slipping on, say, hardwood floors. When they arrived and had no nubbies on the bottom, I realized that "non slip" referred to not slipping down into your shoes. Aha! That's *also* something I wanted. Unfortunately, the "non slip" thing happens only on first wearing. As soon as you put these in the washer and dryer, you're in trouble - welcome to Slip Town.

The first time I wore these socks, I tried them on in my house. No slipping, because they arrive with elastic that's quite strong. But I only tried them on for a bit before I thought, "I should really wash these before I actually wear them." So I threw them in with the laundry and the next day, wore them with Converse Chuck Taylor All Star sneakers. Even before I left the house, they were sliding down to the middle of my foot. I had to reach into my shoe about seven hundred times while I was out shopping and running errands.

However, these socks are *extremely* comfortable and kept my toes warm while I was having an MRI test. So I actually recommend that you use them for cozy times around the house, but wearing them with sneakers and hoping for "non slip" probably isn't the best option.

Pros:
- Cute and comfortable.
- Fit as expected.
- Keep your toes warm.

Cons:
- After the first wash, the elastic starts to wear out and they being "slip" instead of "nonslip"

Disclosure: I received this product at a discount or at no charge for my honest review. In accepting products at a discount or no charge for a review, I am not required to give a good review. I am also not associated with the seller in any way. This disclosure is in accordance with Federal Trade Commissions 16 CFR, Part 255: Guides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising.
summary: Not quite non-slip. Recommended for cozy home time.

After receiving them I was disappointed to find that the sizing as described online wasn't what I imagined it to be. These shoes are way too large for my child to wear right now. However I decided to keep them until they will fit her. The shoes are soft and flexible, perfect for around the house and the crib/pack n play. They are also very wide, good for wide feet. The openings on the tops will allow for air to get in so her feet won't get sweaty.

It's cute and it does the job but it sells itself as being self closing and that is misleading. The canopy closes with the button, but it's tricky and you have to push and push and push the button and if your using the umbrella, it's raining while you do this. Also, only the canopy closes. If it's gonna sell itself as self-closing it should collapse down completely. The canopy closes but then you still have to struggle to collapse the bar.

If all you're looking for is cute and it keeps the rain off, it's a good purchase for the price. That's not all I was looking for.

It's a pretty umbrella.  That's about the best I can say about it.

I took it out of the package to see how it looked opened up.  And was bowled over by the strong, chemical smell.  It actually made my eyes start to water.  I put it on the sun porch to air out a bit, but the smell is still there.

Additionally, the description is very carefully worded to deceive.  Much is made of the special "material" which makes the umbrella waterproof.  Don't interpret the word "material" as meaning "fabric" as there is no actual fabric here at all.  And of course it's waterproof, because it's made out of plastic sheeting.  Just plain plastic.

I'll be returning this tomorrow and then opening the windows to get the smell out of the house.

Added to review:  It seems I won't be returning it after all.  While the seller will accept a return, I would have to pay for the postage -- close to $10 to ship an $18 umbrella!  So I'll give it to charity instead.

Lesson learned:  Be absolutely sure you are buying Prime item if there is any possibility you might have to return it.  "Let the buyer beware"  should appear above listings like this one.
summary: BEWARE.  MADE OF VERY SMELLY PLASTIC, NOT FABRIC.

reviewText: It's all right.

Greatrees men's cotton striped sport pants.  These pants are made of cotton and feature an elastic drawstring.  They have stripes down each leg in an accent color.  There are side seam pockets and one patch pocket on the back.  They are loose to regular fit pants.  The care for them states to hand wash them.  I ordered the size xxxl in the color black.  These pants arrived early and were packaged well.  Xxxl is more like an l or xl.  My husband likes them as lounge pants and they fit him well.  I'm glad I ordered one of the larger sizes.  My husband is not large but does like baggy clothes at times.  The drawstring makes it really nice as he can tighten them the way he wants to.  He said he won't wear them outside as the bottom is tight and the color stripes are bright.  They are not his style.  He wears them around the house all the time though.  I took the time to hand wash them and they have held up well.  I would wear them if the bottoms weren't tight(definitely not my style even for lounge pants).  Overall my husband likes these pants for lounging around the house.  The sizing is a bit iffy.  Xxxl is more of an xl or l.

reviewText: This dress is very cute and a great value.  Take the time to refer to an online size chart. I ordered a size up for my daughter and it fits great.  The elastic waistband is very stretchy. I gave it four stars because it's cute, great design, etc.  It is not 5 stars because the sizing is very small and the fabric is thin.  The belt isn't high quality, but still a good value.

Okay, item one: this dress is NAVY. I don't know how the product image looks on your monitor, but on mine it looks black. I rarely wear navy, so this is kind of important information for me. I really like the dress, but if I send it back, it will be for this reason. I took a couple pictures (with and without flash) to try to show a comparison but even then it's hard to tell. Just take my word for it. Navy.

The dress itself is very cute and well-made. The shirtdress cut is flattering, and the elastic at the waist is great for either emphasizing or creating curves. I would definitely say it runs small. I normally wear a size Large, ordered XL in this, and the dress fits but is tighter than I'd like across the bust. The skirt isn't too tight on my hips, though, which was a shocker considering my pear shape! So I'd say the skirt has a lot of leeway, and you should choose to go up at least one size but maybe two based on your bust. I'm a 36D and the buttons pulled pretty severely across the chest. I'll probably end up wearing it with just one or two buttons done up and show some cleavage for summer I guess! As for length, I'm 5'2" and the dress hit a few inches above my knees.

The pattern is adorable, obviously, and looks the same in person as in the photos. The great thing is that from a distance it just looks like some kind of dot pattern. It's only up close that you realize it's cats! Yes! The fabric is both great and awful. It's light and drapey, almost silky, and I love that, but it also generates its own impressive static field. The dress isn't lined but you'll probably want to wear it either with a slip or leggings or it will cling horribly. You could also use Scotch Guard or a dryer sheet rubbed on the inside of the skirt.

The belt is fine considering the price, but it's pretty obviously cheap and there are no belt loops on the dress anyway. So I probably won't use the belt. But overall this dress is flattering, high quality and the print could not be cuter. An excellent summer purchase.

reviewText:
The dress is quite well made for the price, consistent with other dresses I have purchased from ACEVOG. For reference, I generally wear an 18 in US sizing; I ordered this in a XXL and it fits just fine (also consistent with other ACEVOG dresses I own). The print is beautiful (I purchased the "Rose Red" version, which has a floral pattern that looks like cherry blossoms along with some lovely colorful birds), the scalloped neckline is a really nice detail, and the material is a mid-weight cotton blend with some stretch to it - it's a nice weight for wearing in the warmer months. The waistline is higher than it appears in the picture, at least on my dress. It's more of an empire waist, hitting just below the bust. This does not bother me, as empire waists are good for hiding a bit of tummy. My only issue is that the bottom hem is not straight across. At all. As a result, the sides of the dress are significantly and noticeably shorter than the front and back of the dress, on the order of a couple inches. I have not had this issue with an ACEVOG dress before. (I've actually never had this issue with ANY dress before, and I own an embarrassing number of dresses from a variety of brands.) I will probably still keep the dress, as it's not something most people will notice at first glance, but it does bother me. I may try to fix the hem myself, but I'm not much of a seamstress.

Edited to Add: It appears, at least based on the pictures the other reviewers have posted, that there may be an issue with the pattern for this dress - none of them mention it; however, their dresses seem to have the same issue with the front of the skirt being longer than the sides. (Which is actually the opposite of what you'd expect - normally the fabric would stretch where it was cut on the bias, which is usually at the side seams, not the front and back.) I ended up returning the dress. The discrepancy was too noticeable and really bothered me.
summary: Pretty, decent quality dress for the price

Finally it arrived! Order on June 22nd and received this swimsuit today. A very cute swimsuit and concept. The colors are vivid and nice on the bottoms and built in bra top. The material is very silky. The entire suit fits okay, but the seams around the front of the armpits seams a little loose. I think these need to have some elastic added to them so they can shape to different body types. The bottoms fit very well. They are a full coverage bikini bottom that almost go up my belly button. The black drapey panel is loose ( I think it should be a little less material so it's no so bulky looking) and the fabric flows enough to hide and stomach issues. The back is really cute and strappy with an adjustable strap that can help the suit to better fit on top.  The bra area does not have an underwire. It does however have a some light elastic banding and built in cups. Overall I would say this is nice modest swimsuit that can help conceal any mid section flaws while keeping it cute. The quality of the fabric is soft but it is definitely lacking in elastic bands in the fitted seams on the top. I usually wear a large (I'm a 10-12 in American sizes) and I read other reviews along with taking my measurements and decided to go up to the X-Large. A very wise choice! I purchased this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. I am an avid Amazon shopper and understand the importance of honesty in reviewing. I hope this helps any in decisions to purchase.

In spite of the sizing being way off, this is a really nice bathing suit!  I bought this bathing suit for my daughter.  She really liked the look of it, and liked that it had a nice loose top, that would help cover the part of her body she is most self-conscious about.

I used other people's recommendations in choosing the size.  Normally my daughter wears a size 6/8.  She has a DD chest size.  I ended up ordering an XXL - it was a chance, but since it was such a good price, we were willing to take the chance.  She wants to wear it to an up-coming music festival.  My daughter was looking for a bathing suit that was modest, yet looked good, too.

The bottoms in XXL were a good fit for her size 6/8.  They went from just below her belly button to her upper thighs.  They are a very cute boy short.  The top is like wearing a bra top with a wide armed tank top over it.  The XXL covered her DD chest comfortably - she has a little cleavage showing, but not a lot.  The long tank top covers / conceals her tummy, which is what she is sensitive about.

My daughter says it is very comfortable, and looks forward to wearing it to the festival.  The colors look just like you see in the picture - she got the blue one with polka-dots.

Please keep the sizing in mind as you order!
summary: Runs very small, but looks great on!  Size XXL is size 6/8.

reviewText:
I am a woman, but I have broader shoulders and larger biceps than "average" women, so I tend to have to get men's shirts. I have a few of Woolly Clothing Co men's merino wool shirts (the 190gsm kind), and the zippered hoodies. Compared to those, this shirt is considerably softer!

This has become my favorite wool shirt to wear, because it is incredibly soft. I have fibromyalgia, and sometimes my skin is extremely sensitive; I was able to wear this shirt even during this latest "flare," which was stunning to me and for which I am extremely grateful. I have hypothyroidism, as well, so most of the time I run "cooler" than most (okay, I get cold and turn purple, all right?), and wool has been a sort of rescue in helping me to regulate my body heat better. This particular shirt is so amazingly soft, I hardly even notice I'm wearing it! That is a rarity!

The blue color is a very nice shade, and compliments my skin tone; it's a vivid shade, without being glaring. I have washed this shirt maybe 3 times (upon receiving and twice after that) in my HE front load washer (using Euclan wash, no rinse soap) and I hang it to dry. It dries very quickly and is ready to go, even in cooler room temperatures (there's snow outside and it's been at or below freeze for a couple of weeks).

I seriously LOVE this shirt, and am please with the quality of clothing that I have purchased from Woolly Clothing Company. I definitely recommend this shirt to men AND women, as it's not overly baggy, nor is it "form fitting." It is a good balance in fit and in fabric. More colors in this style please, Woolly Clothing Company!
Excellent quality, comfortable, this is very light weight and a thin fabric.
Brighter than expected, but fits well and serves my purposes.
I love merino wool tees for travel. This fit the bill perfectly.
Its just a little tight in the sleeves and the sleeves are just a little short. Otherwise perfect. Soft, warm but breathable. Awesome color.

I travel for work -- and this is the shirt I take to wear in the gym. The fit is great, it wicks sweat like a technical fabric, and it never, ever stinks. I've been buying more and more merino wool clothing, and it's truly a miracle fabric for business travel. I wash this once a week, but honestly there are some weeks where I've had a fast turn around and it's stayed in the bag... still no stink and feels great every time I put it on. If it's especially sweaty, I'll hang it up to dry.
summary: Great casual travel shirt with amazing fabric.

First, quality.  I expect a pair of underwear to last me about a year assuming it's worn once a week and washed as per instructions on the label.  This underwear has holes in it from regular use after only two months.  I wash in cold water and tumble dry on low heat.

Second, price.  This costs a premium compared to the alternatives (cotton or poly big brand name products).  Even using merino wool a product manufactured in China should not be at this price point.  Woolly must be making a fortune on the markup.  I really don't mind paying premium prices but I expect the product that I get for it to be premium and Woolly clothes don't cut it.

This dress has a very unusual design to the pattern.  It's mostly cut straight down, but it flares out under the armpit (away from the body by a few inches), creating weird points that stick out.  If you put your arms down, the points will squash down, but then it causes a weird wrinkle/pleat in the front of the dress.  I contacted Camixa customer service, and they advised me trying a larger size (they said that if it's worn looser that the flare won't show up).  From what they said, it seems like they altered the armhole dimensions since some customers had complained that the armholes were too large, and that's whats created the issue.  I was looking for a normal fit to wear with a belt, so I'll be returning it.

If you intend to wear this very loose, you probably won't have an issue.  However, if you're looking for a normal fit, steer clear.

reviewText:
This "dress" might be the right size for a child's size 8/10.  I am 5' 2" (on a good day!) and weigh 117 pounds. I normally wear a size 2-4 and sometimes a 0; always a small or x-small. I almost always have to have things hemmed shorter, even in petites, to accommodate my height limitations. I ordered using the manufacturers sizing recommendations with specific attention to the breast measurement because with a dress of this style that will be the most important. This "dress" wasn't even long enough to cover my crotch and was so tight along the bustline it was cutting into me as the pics show. It was big enough around at the hips the butt.  I'm going to give this dress to my niece; she's 9 years old. In quality and size this is an appropriate dress for a child but not for a woman.

I am in love! These are a baby shower, parent must have! The outside is a plastic like material kind of like sleeping bags and the inside is a soft almost cotton like matterial. They are machine washable and driable. I really like that I can just toss them in with laundry after a day of swimming, and if my son has a #2 accident I just unbutton it and rinse it with the hose. Now these are NOT pee proof; I learned this the hard way after holding my son and getting a warm wet feeling all over my shirt. my son loves wearing it and never tried to take it off since its so comfortable or at least I'm assuming since he freaks out when I go to exchange it for a diaper. The adjustable snaps on the side really do make it universal so that newborns up to age 2 or 3 could wear it with no problem. I'm so happy I no longer have to spend tons of money on little swimmers anymore. The two I got came in cute little ocean theme pictures so we always get compliments on his cute swimmers.
I received this item free for my honest opinion and review.

Since this pack came with two we can pretty much just keep rotating between them since they wash rather easily. I was really worried about having to spend a fortune on disposable swimming diapers but these have saved us a ton of money already halfway through our first summer. I would definitely recommend these to any parent of a little one who you plan on taking to the beach or the pool so they can have fun without any added stress for you. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased testimony.

It is off to the side and it is fine, but I wish I could have seen this in the picture.  I am not from China, therefor, I do not know what this says.
The material used says right on the tag it is 100% silk feeling polyester.  It seems well made, though very delicate.  This is very light weight and the length is that of a normal decorative scarf.  This is long enough you can tie it in many ways and is versatile.  This could be used in many ways, but the seller claims this can be used to help block the sun, I would not rely on only this as I said before it is very sheer and would not protect you much from the sun's rays.  They also claim that this helps cancel noise around you, again, it is a sheer scarf so I highly doubt that is a function of this product.
I love the look and the flow of this, very beautiful.  It is a great purchase though shipping price is a bit steep.

I'd like to consider myself pretty easy to please for the most part.  I don't have very many delusions about life, i.e. expecting perfection.  Everything is flawed, and I have respect for the work and craftsmanship that goes into even the smallest things in life.  This all changes when I feel deceived.  Then I am not pleased at all.  So consider this a warning and, in rare form, a declaration of my displeasure.

This scarf does not come close to being georgette silk, and not even georgette silk-like material.  TWINKLE.H states in the description that it is made of a "high quality, soft, lightweight georgette silk material".  The *POLYESTER* which is used is not smooth to the touch and cannot even begin to imitate silk.  It has no durability to it whatsoever.  I literally got it just today, took it out of the package and inspected it, and right off the bat saw threads going everywhere and tears in the fabric.  So if it can't even leave the shop and survive transit looking like it's in tact, how is it going to last being used by the purchaser?  It looks and feels cheap, both the material and the print.  If you love scarves, like I do, then you will be greatly bothered by the quality of this one.  Day ONE of having it and it is literally falling apart.  Even on the shipping package they marked that the worth of this scarf is one dollar.  That just about sums it up for me.  My niece is now the proud owner of a play scarf.  Good luck to those interested in this.

reviewText:
Aside from a stiff, and slightly awkward to use at first, zipper; this is a fantastic coat. I followed the advice of previous purchasers of this coat and order a few sizes larger than I'd normally wear, and it fits me quite nicely. Luckily this jacket arrived just as a large rain storm did, so I got to test it out (this October has been the wetest one in my neck of the woods in a century, or so says the local news). Suffice to say, I was kept warm and toasty!

I appreciate all the zippered pockets, the ample hood, and the soft micro fleece lining. Something the description didn't mention is that the chest pockets both have a d-ring to attach keys to as well as a smaller pen pocket in each, and that all the pockets (save for the one on the left cuff and the one on the small of the back) have a nice port you can thread your headphone cable through...

Overall I am both impressed and satisfied with this jacket.
summary: Well made jacket with a tailored fit...

This is a really nice top. The fabric itself to is very smooth, almost silk like but seems to have better strength and durability. I still aim to be a little more careful when I wear or wash it though. The fit is spot on and flattering for the most part. I am not a fan of tank tops or spaghetti straps because the chub that I have around my shoulders and underarms tends to show. This is a very nice compromise. Not a full short sleeve because my underarm is open as it would be in a tank. So it is refreshing because I can keep cooler when in the sun but not feel self conscious. However the arm hole is a bit big for me, and so you are able to see my bra when I raise my arm. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. Otherwise I am in love with this shirt and wear it often! It is a great piece to wear whenever and can be dressed up or dressed down. Plus the color is gorgeous. Oh one more thing, oftentimes soft smooth shirts like this are see through so you can see your bra or even your belly button. That is not the case with this shirt. Seriously. It's a wonderful beautiful shirt.

I feel as though I should mention that these boxer briefs are not suitable for those out there with bigger or muscular thighs. These men's boxer briefs are extremely comfortable and the waistband is exceptionally smooth on contact with no pinching in the waist. There are a few concerns for those who have larger thighs than average. I train legs twice a week but my legs are not extremely thick and these DO ride up due to my leg circumference. I usually walk a few miles a day and they ride up within half a mile or so making them uncomfortable to walk in. Overall, I do like the material and initial feel but if you have larger thighs than normal, i.e. trains legs and such, then these boxer briefs are probably not for you.

Pros: Comfortable to wear when relaxing all day.
  Fantastic comfort on the elastic waistband
  Give the extra room need with the 'pouch'

Cons: They ride up if you have bigger thighs due to weight training
  The care/information tag ran completely off after one wash. Previous briefs faded after a year or so.
  They pinch a lot when they ride up and make it uncomfortable for those long walks

Overall, these boxer briefs are great for most but do not make the mistake of buying them if you are a lifter or mountain biker like myself with muscular thighs. Maybe if the length was extended slightly it would work as intended but I am no expert in that field. I would submit a photo of my embarrassing circumstance when they ride up but we have all been there at one time or another and doubt you'd like to see it. The great insight that came out of my purchase was knowing that the material type that these Lapasa boxer briefs are made out of are ideal for me.

This is a review of the Womens 50S Plus Size Skirted Tankini Crossover Vintage Swim dress Swimsuit.

****BASE YOUR ORDER USING THE US SIZE LISTED IN THE DROP DOWN MENU WHEN YOU ORDER VS. USING THE CHART THAT IS LISTED.****

Summary  I am giving this 5 stars HOWEVER only because I was able to give this to my wifes mom who was able to fit it combined with the quality and findings after it was tried on and used.

Sizing - If you look in the drop down menu under label size and see 2X, the size next to it shows US 10-12. On the size chart, this shows the size is actually US 18-20. I was able to confirm that if you are in the US, the true size is the one in the drop down.
Now about the Swim Suit

This is a very nice swimsuit for the very low price it is being sold for. Typical swimsuits are typically upwards of $30-60+ and this one is the same if not better quality that the other types we have paid much more for.

My wife (and ironically her mother) do not like revealing types of clothes and they both really enjoyed the way this one was designed. The design is very attractive, modest and while vintage in nature, was a modern design. The upper portion of the suit has a built in underwire bra (padded breast area), has an overlay designed front and crossing straps in the rear. This bottom of the suit is free flowing and covers a pant legs-type of bottom.

Material is quite stretchy and the stitching is both tight and even. When worn by my wifes mother, she was happy to have the pant legs vs. a simple crotch design. In terms of the breast area  padded cups, she did verify this suit was in fact designed for a larger size of breast closest if not larger than a D. It is certainly able to be used with a smaller cup, however, it was a slightly looser fit in that area.

I don't know about you, but I depend very heavily on reviews that are posted on Amazon. I also read what reviewers on Amazon have to say. I want to help others by providing my reviews that detail the product as well as the experience I have with the products that I get on Amazon.

Please note I have no relationship with this seller. I did receive this free in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.  I take my reviews serious and will only provide my true feedback. Thank you!
summary: Now about the Swim Suit This is a very nice swimsuit for the very low price it is being ...

reviewText:
I was interested in finding a floor-length summer dress and I am so happy that I came across this one. I am normally a size 0 or 2 and I ordered the small of this dress. It came in multiple envelopes and I was surprised that it was not wrinkled. It is made out of 88% polyester and 12%spandex. This dress says to hand wash only which is not very convenient. When I was wearing the dress for pictures I did not have the right bra on and needed a strapless and backless bra--probably one of those stick on kinds. The collar is very high and the back has one hole near the top and a second hole which is open-back. There are two large slits on either side of the bottom of the dress. The dress is a little long for me (I'm 5'1) but looks nicer with really tall heels. The material is cool to the touch and almost feels similar to wicking material used in workout clothes. My biggest problem with this dress is that it not having somewhere to wear this cool dress. It did have some fraying in the seams of the dress where the side panels split for the legs. Not all of the sides of the dress are sewn and I am worried that it will continue to fray. It would be nicer if it was machine washable too.

reviewText: This review is for the Ninimour Women's Lace Up Neck Bodycon Bandage Cocktail Party Dress. This dress is very sexy. I really love it, but it does run very small. I purchased this one in an extra large. I normally wear a large or a size 14. This dress fits very snug. Luckily I have been losing weight and am hoping to lose enough in the next month to be able to wear it comfortably on a cruise I am going on in mid August. Based on the measurements it should have fit fine. In a way for me it might be good because it may have been too big by my vacation if I continued to lose the weight the way I am losing it. It is form fitting and looks really good on, or at least I know it will later. I love the cut out design in the chest area. It is made of a thinner stretchy material which is great for those hot summer nights when you want to get dressed up to go out but want something cool to wear. So overall good dress, just buy it in a size or two larger. I received this dress at a discounted price to give my honest review and this is my honest review of the Ninimour Women's Lace Up Neck Bodycon Bandage Cocktail Party Dress
summary: I really love it, but it does run very small

reviewText: This dress is lovely.  The silhouette of this dress is lovely.  It is very feminine and flattering.  In order to achieve the fullness of the skirt, however you do need a crinoline underneath.  I am about a women's dress size 12/14 normally and I bought the XL which fit perfectly.  The arm holes were even amply sized enough and I have robust upper arms.  There is no stretch BTW to the fabric.  The down side was the color.  It is not the lovely light robin egg blue as it looks in the picture.  The description lists it as being "mint" and it IS Mint colored.  It is definitely closer on the green spectrum than the blue spectrum.  I was hoping to use it for an Alice in Wonderland costume but it is not the right color.  Would be perfect for a Wendy Darling Costume (from Peter Pan),  The other negative about the color is it is slightly sheer (see-through) ish.  Enough that I would be very cautious what undergarments I wear with it.

reviewText: Great Purchase for Wwf Era fans

This Attitude Era Championship replica belt is the title I've been waiting forever to purchase. That would have been dope if it had the WWF logo, but that one is no longer for sale on Amazon. Nevertheless, this is my favorite out of all the belts I got. So Daddy is gonna take good care of him. If you look at the thickness of the belt, it's actually thicker than the world championships I got. This is a gorgeous, gorgeous big eagle belt. Certainly after Stone Cold Steve Austin beat "The Heartbreak Kid" Shawn Michaels at WrestleMania XIV, The Texas Rattlesnake had the winged eagle belt, and was presented with the big eagle championship gold one night later on RAW by none other than WWE Chairman Vince McMahon. I believe this WWE logo was supposed to be decorated in white.  Got some jewels here. Some globes right here with the blue painting. The big centered globe right there. I wish it came with the replacement simulated gems. The big lion with the WWE logo right up top nicely done. The McMahon family crest was nicely done in red that is pretty cool.
summary: this is my favorite out of all the belts I got

Just as described. Came with all the official Luminox boxing. Slightly heavier than the other mainline SEAL watch. But nothing to complain about because the other didn't weigh much to begin with. The second hand strikes centered on all the minute indices. Very BRIGHT green tritium. Can easily see it in just a dimly lit room without the eyes adjusting. One of the photos it looks like the tritium tube is off centred from the hand. It's not, just a shadow effect.

After thoughts. This line has the better Ronda 715 movement with 6 jewels. The other SEAL line uses the Ronda 515 zero jewel movement.  Although it says it's a 44mm watch case, it feels smaller than that. Maybe because of the refined lugs on the case. The mineral crystal is slightly recessed below the bezel, protecting the crystal. An improvement from the other SEAL line.

Over a month of ownership. I've worn it nearly continuously for a month. Still great condition. Only 1 second off in that month. Great durable watch and great great price. I wear the watch 24/7 even while sleeping. The watch doesn't get caught on things and the rubber strap doesn't "grab" and bite at smooth materials. Thanks to it's rounded off edges compared to the other SEAL line watches.

reviewText: Received this watch today. It's everything I expected it would be. It has good heft, but wears light because of the resin case. I like watches about 42mm, and this is a good size for my taste. No screw down crown, but I don't need it. The strap is flexible and very comfortable.the pin that secures the strap to size is wide and makes the watch feel secure on my wrist. It came in a nice zippered Luminox travel case, not the one pictured but better for my needs. Buy with confidence.
Excellent quality watch. Price/quality ratio es also excellent

To preface. I've just sent two Traser Code Greens back to a different vendor, as both had loose and spinning hour and minute hands upon opening.  I've read similar anecdotes about the Luminox brand as well.  Yet, I thought I'd try my hand one more time with another MB-Microtec factory variant.  This time, I am absolutely delighted!  Unlike the Traser, this watch is SUBSTANTIAL.  It has just the right bit of heft to let you know this isn't a plastic toy; yet it's light enough to let you forget you're wearing it.  It's the perfect size for my 7 inch wrist.  The dial face itself is quite large; very legible.  Just now, the tritium was visible to me in the low light of my bedroom hallway.  I turned off the lights, and could readily see the tritium.  I'm sure it'll be quite bright once my eyes adjust.  Further, the crystal seems to have an anti-reflective/glare coating. The reasons I chose this watch over the 3050 series are thus:  Green tritium with orange 12 o'clock tritium, "multi-jewel movement"....it stands to reason this would be a Ronda 715 or better, standard 22mm size lugs (easier to find nato straps, as opposed to 23mm), and the fact that the calendar dial has a black background rather than the usual white, which I think blends better.  And at this price, the watch is an exceptional value!  The watch came with the correct packaging, all tags, and even a warranty card.  I don't think I could be much happier!  Thanks, Decor Plus.
summary: I am absolutely delighted! Unlike the Traser

I found the top neckline and black material to be a little too dominating.  However, the dress pattern is beautiful.  I love the pink and cream flowers with the black material.  I think if I had a bit more of a bust, this would have been super flattering.  Perhaps I need to get a new bra or something to help this dress shape up a little better.  I have a petticoat that I will definitely try with this dress.  I love the vintage 50s look and it is a super sweet and classic look.  Unfortunately, my bust makes it a little bit of a bust.  I don't fault the dress though.  The dress is well made and it's very lovely, just as it's pictured.

reviewText: This is such a cute dress--the floral print is beautiful and it fits well. I am about 5'4, 115 lbs. and the size small fits comfortably. It fits snug, but comfortable and not suffocating. The skirt is definitely not as full as pictured, so if you want some fullness then you will need to wear a petticoat underneath. I have yet to try it with one but I suspect that this dress will look great with the fuller skirt. My only gripe is that the chest area/design doesn't fit so great. I am around a B cup, and it just looks a little funny in that area. I am thinking I'll just fold some of the fabric inward to bring the neckline down a bit, or have it tailored to fit better. I had my sister try the dress on as well thinking maybe she'd fit that area better but even with her D cup the design just didn't look quite right. Overall this dress is still pretty cute and a good deal despite the awkward chest design. I received this dress at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
These earrings are quite lovely.

I received the middle size, described as 0.30-0.32 inch, and would say that seems to have been exactly what we received. Why not five stars then? Well...

Upon arrival, I tried to gently lift the earrings out of their presentation box, and one of the earrings pulled right off of its post. The adhesive material (lets call it glue) that attached the pearl to the post was gooey and wet, and got all over my fingertips. I did not pull hard; the thing just popped off, like it had been packed before being allowed to dry or maybe the glue was old...?

So then, why not one star?

Because I was able to wipe off the gooey residue so that you can't even tell it was there, and then used one drop of Loctite Super Glue that we had in the house to put the earring back together. Just a quick drop on the post, then I pushed them together. You can't see the glue at all, and I let the set sit for two days before trying to put them on.

Presto. Problem solved, as long as the Loctite Super Glue doesn't breakdown the pearl over time (will come back and update the review if it does).

Bottom-line: We had a little glitch that was solved fairly easily. These earrings look great and are very comfortable to wear. Since other reviewers do not seem to have experienced the same issue that I did, my loose earring issues seems to be a fluke that we solved with a dab of Loctite Super glue... though I could have returned for a replacement pair.  Based on how they look and feel right now, I would recommend giving this set a try if you seek a pair of earrings of this construction, size and price.

Recommended

Go for it.

summary: UHIBROS Freshwater Natural Cultured Pearl Earrings - 925 Sterling Silver Stud - Comfortable - Pretty - Recommended

reviewText:
I chose the smallest size in these pearl earrings, the 0.25-0.27 inch size. I think they are plenty big enough to be seen without looking gaudy or costumey. These earrings come in a blue box with an extra set of backings in a little bag under the earring bed. The earrings are pearl and sterling and are absolutely perfect. Three is not a blemish or dimple on them. They are perfectly round and smooth. They are a creamy white, not an absolute bright white. They are light in my ears so I can wear them all day and night without discomfort and they don't drag my lobes down.

These earrings are simple and classy. I can wear them at any time. They're fine for casual wear and great for formal occasions. I mean, pearls really are the hallmark of femininity anytime. I never was a big fan of pearls and still am not. I don't wear pearl necklaces or bracelets but I do like good pearl earrings. Against my dark hair and medium skin, they look good and are such an easy choice when I am in a hurry and want to make sure I have earrings on. I have three piercings in one ear and two in the other. I sometimes wear these alone, sometimes with very tiny CZs or other really small loops or posts. I don't want to take away from the simple beauty of the pearl.

These earrings lock well and I haven't felt that they were loose or unstable in my ears. I am very happy with them. They're the type of earring every woman should own and wear even if it is with jeans and a T.

I received these earrings are a reduced price or free (Forgot which. It has been a while. I was making sure they were good quality and would hold up to frequent use.) in exchange for my honest review. I am not affiliated with the seller and was not compensated for my review. I like these very much and am glad I didn't go with one of the larger sizes. These, to me, are the perfect size.

This is a review of the UHIBROS 925 Sterling Silver Freshwater Pearl Stud Earrings.

Summary  These are an amazing set of pearl earrings. These are 100% real, AAA Quality Cultured and have silver studs. Both the posts and the earing backings are marked 925, although the print on the stud is very hard to see as it is small. What I like about these is they are more of a classy and elegant type of earring. They are a simple type of design and yet they bring a lot of focus to the ears when worn. You will also get an extra set of silver backing as well which was a nice add in. The backings are nice and snug and the post has an indent as a way to prevent the backs from sliding off. In terms of quality, these are very nice. Unlike fake pearls, these have a nice luster to them when light hits them as well as a visual overtone. My wife has already received comment as to how nice they look when worn to church and guess the only thing I need to do now is make sure the next item I get is a matching pearl necklace. Oh and they come in a nice blue display box. So no need to shop for a presentation box for these if you are gifting.

As with all my reviews, should these have any issues with ongoing use, I will update this review .

I don't know about you, but I depend very heavily on reviews that are posted on Amazon. I also read what reviewers on Amazon have to say. I want to help others by providing my reviews that detail the product as well as the experience I have with the products that I get on Amazon.

Please note I have no relationship with this seller. I did receive this free in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.  I take my reviews serious and will only provide my true feedback. Thank you!
summary: Summary  These are an amazing set of pearl earrings

reviewText: This wallet is cute and stylish, and has enough room for all my stuff. However, the zipper pocket does not fit my cell phone, which is relatively small (a Google pixel) and when I use it as a clutch and carry it by the wrist strap, some of my cards slide out of the other end and that's really disappointing.

Can I just say. POCKETS! Like, it's never ending. To start, I really love the color. I got the blue wallet, and it's a very beautiful muted shade of blue-grey. The synthetic leather is very soft. I needed something to hold my new phone, and I'm not one for huge clutches. I wanted something that could stay on my wrist if I went to the grocery store, and if I'm going to carry a bulky purse, there's no way I wanted a bulky wallet too. There are 12 card slots, which is way more than I need, as well as an opaque ID window. There are TWO long pockets behind the cards on each side, and a middle zippered pocket that spans the whole width of the wallet. Two zipper pockets on the back, and one more open pocket behind the wallet front flap. Seriously. I can't imagine what anyone would use all that space for, but I love having it!! Means I can go without a purse if I needed. I've had it for a month and wanted to see how it held up before reviewing it. And my only "problem", if that, is that the wrist strap snapped off, but due to operator error - I slipped it all the way up my arm, so it was entirely my fault. And I can sew it back on, so no problem. Really really happy with this purchase!
summary: Really nice wallet - I love it!

First let me tell you I got this totally super adorable wristlet at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. I have been eyeing this wristlet on amazon and ebay from several different sellers and when I saw it at a discount I was super excited, I am a ridiculous cheapskate.  Anyway,  when I received it , it was packaged quite well. In a padded envelope,  in a plastic wrapper, inside a branded pouch . There were no folds, bends or scratches on it at all. It is just like it looks in the pictures.  Maybe even better. The material is soft, the zippers are shiny and pretty and above all else, all the zippers work nicely and do not stick.it has two zipper parts on the back and on the inside there is a zipper part that allows you storage behind all the card slots, and I have never seen a wallet with that feature before.  The strap is sturdy and big enough to fit around my fist, but small enough to stay put and not fall off. The lining is nice,  well sown and will not get out of place or get caught in the zippers. It does have a plastic smell, I left it open for an hour and it is almost gone. Everything has a smell, so it isn't a deal breaker. The color is nice, and it has a ton of storage for all of those friggin loyalty cards stores push on us to track our purchases so they can do the targeted advertising crap. Back to the matter at hand, I highly recommend this wristlet, it is the bees knees.

This dress fits true to size. I am almost 50 tall and weigh 109 lbs and it fits perfectly. It does need a small hem (depending on preference). The material is so soft on your skin (almost like a very soft T-shirt). It has a scoop neck and an empire waist giving pleats and falls so nicely at the bottom with quarter sleeves. This is an all-season dress and is so versatile. You can dress it up or down with heels and jewelry or some sandals and a belt. It can be worn for casual events or to semi-formal events like parties, church etc. So many ways to wear this super comfortable dress. It comes in black, navy and red. I love the fact that the dress doesnt cling when you walk. It can be worn in warmer weather and not get overheated or cooler weather with a sweater or cardigan. You are bound to get compliments when walking into the room wearing this dress. The one thing I would recommend is when ironing the dress, use a really low setting and use and ironing cloth. Otherwise, I highly recommend this dress. I think this dress would flatter any figure/ Although I received this product at a discounted rate for my review, my opinions are truthful and honest as I buy many products myself based on product reviews and would not deceive buyers in any way with my own personal product reviews. Hope this review helps and happy shopping.
summary: The material is so soft on your skin (almost like a very soft T-shirt)

reviewText:
I purchased the WeBravery Long Cross Luggage Straps Suitcase Belts Travel Tag Strap Accessories to use on an upcoming trip to Ireland.  Going through the busiest airport in the world I wanted something to to make my luggage stand out from all the others.  These straps are thick and sturdy and fit around both sides of the luggage.  They are easily adjustable to fit any size piece of luggage.  And the black clips are large and sturdy as well so you don't have to worry about them coming undone. On our last trip to Ireland we had a suitcase burst at the zipper if we had these straps we wouldn't have dumped the contents in the terminal. There is also a pocket for you to add your identification card.  I will be purchasing more straps for all our luggage.

 I received a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review and all opinions are based on my personal experience.
summary: Secure your luggage especially if you overpack :-)

My kids just took a two week trip to Canada and I purchased some luggage straps for them to use so they would be able to keep their luggage secure and also be able to easily identify it at the airport.

Once they came home and mentioned how happy they were to have the straps, I decided that my husband and I also need some for our luggage.  We are all traveling out of country in 2 weeks and I figure these will come in handy.  We tried them out on our luggage and they adjusted to fit perfectly and kept the bag secure.  I purchased the orange so we will definitely be able to see our bags quickly.

This has a great cross design that makes the straps more secure. The buckles are easy to use and seem to be well made.  The whole set is quality and seems like it will last.

secures your luggage

durable

CONS:
none at this point

reviewText: I bought black/white flower power and jewel flower chevron in one size. They each came with a different brand tag...Kathy and New Mix. I wasn't expecting that and think they should be advertised as coming from different brands. One had an elastic waist and the other had a yoga band style waist, I prefer the latter and think the waist style should be disclosed also. The elastic waist ones came up to under my breasts so I had fold them down. I'm 5'2", 125 and they both fit me ok but the legs were a little less snug than I would have liked. I'm hoping they shrink a little after washing/drying. They came to right under my knee and I'm short, while I'm glad about the length taller women might find them too short. Having said all that, I would buy them again because they are priced so low and feel just as soft as LLR leggings.

I have ordered 4 pairs of the Capris and 2 of them (Floral Illusions and Mint Fresh) are buttery soft and fit well up to a large.  However, the other 2 pairs (Black and Black White Petal Power) are both smaller and not as soft. I believe that there are several brands being sold under this one listing. Only 1 of the 4 pairs has had the yoga waist (Black White Petal Power) but it was significantly smaller in size. It is a toss up what brand/material/size that you will receive when purchasing one of these leggings. Good luck- some of them are awesome!
summary: Good luck- some of them are awesome

I am 56 and about 135 pounds. I ordered this suit in a size US10/44, and it fits very well. I typically wear a US size 6-8, but am long-waisted, and I don't think a smaller size would have fit me. The colors in this suit are exactly what I expected based on the pictures in the product listing. I really like the neon pink--I had thought it might be too harsh against my pale skin, but its just fine.

This suit does have underwire, so it has really good support. The underwires are sewn in well and don't jab at me at all. The skirt is a good length (covers my rear end, but isn't super long either) and flows nicely. I REALLY like the straps on this suit because they are wide and don't dig into my shoulders. I also like that they go over my shoulders (like a bra) rather than around my neck. The hems and seams are done well, with surging in the appropriate places. There was one place with an extra piece of threading after the hem was surged, but it was easily snipped off without any raveling. The bottoms of the suit are like bicycle shorts, but they aren't as long as some of the other swimsuits I have tried, which makes them more comfortable. The torso is fully lined and the fabric is light and flowy.

The style of this suit is very similar to another one of the same brand that I adore. This one might have a teeny bit less support in the bosom, but I still really like it. I feel confident, modest, and secure while wearing it, and I would definitely wear this one in public.

I purchased this swimsuit at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I did not receive any other compensation, and I am not obligated to write a favorable review. I have used this product myself, and all words in this review are my own.

I had such high hopes for this suit, but ended up disappointed.

PROS:
The color is as pictured.
The material seems to be good quality.
It arrived in a timely manner.

CONS:
The sizing is WAY off!!  I normally wear a 10 or 12 & ordered the XXXL (US 12-14).  My measurements are: Bust 40", Waist 32.5", Hips 44" & I'm about 5' 4" & 165 lbs.  The top is huge & the bottoms are tiny.  I would say the top is at least a true XXL or XXXL & would guess the bottoms to be a SM or MED.  The top is so baggy that even the "bikini" top part under the tank doesn't come close to fitting & the bottoms are so small I could hardly get them on.

If the sizing were proportionate, I would re-order this suit in a heartbeat to get the correct size, but as it stands I would probably need a large in the top & a 5XL in the bottoms to get a proper fit.  Since it's not possible to order each piece in a different size & I'm not paying for 2 suits just to take the top from one & bottoms from the other, I'll regrettably be returning this suit.

I wanted a pair of camouflage pattern pants for use when riding my mountain bike. Needed pants that are snug near the ankles, so as to prevent catching of fabric in the bike's chain drive.

The product page in Amazon advised that the sizing was for the Chinese market, and to order ONE size larger than your usual. So I ordered what was advertised as men's size L. At that time, the ad did not read China L or US S. I received a garment that was labeled L. When layed flat on a table top, it's dimensions are as follows:

Unstretched waist: 13 1/4" across (therefore 26 1/2")
Stretched waist:18" across (therefore 36")
Inseam: 28 1/2"
Overall length from top of waist to bottom of leg: 38"

My waist measures 35" at the navel. I normally wear slacks of waist size 34, which tend to fit me a bit loose. I am height 6'0" and have an athletic build; only about 16% body fat.

These pants, although expandable to a waist 36" fit me ridiculously tight; This is due to the skinny fit around the upper and lower legs, and especially over the buttox. My wife joked that it was so tight on me that it looked like something that a gay person might wear :-)  So I'm donating them to Goodwill.

Apart from the sizing issue, it is actually VERY WELL MADE. The bottom of the legs have brass zipper closures to enable the bottoms to open for getting the pants on/off, and then to close for a snug fit where its needed at the bottom for bike riding. Excellent design and construction for mountain biking! I just needed one size larger than was advertised and labeled, that's all. If the vendor would offer one size larger (a true US men's size M) then I would certainly try ordering this item again (with my fingers crossed).

With proper sizing for the American market, I could've rated this product 5 stars.
summary: Two sizes smaller than expected for an American men's size

reviewText:
First of all I have ordered other clothing on line and my experience has been that they always run small,  so I bought this dress one size bigger then I would normally wear and I am glad I did because this dress does run small.
This dress is made of thinner fabric then I expected, But my sister reminded me that this dress didn't cost much so it is of expected value.
It is a cute dress though.  I just have to wear a slip with it. Or I was thinking it would be perfect to wear to the beach. (I could just wear your bathing suit under it)  This dress would be nice and cool on a hot day. And I do have to say it is comfy.

I will say I wish there were more pictures from different angles of these shoes before ordering. I was expecting more of a sandal, and these shoes cover most of my daughter's foot with a "peep toe" type of style. They are very comfortable and my daughter likes to wear them (she is one and walking/cruising). They're squishly and soft on the arches, and the rest of the shoe has a soft pleather type of fabric. Personally I would have liked these better if they were more of a sandal style than what came, but that was my own error in ordering for not noticing so I can't dock a star for that. They're still extremely cute, and my daughter loves them (though her favorite part was chewing on them after we opened them, not wearing them).

I ordered the largest size and they're already going to be too small for her soon unfortunately, but that's just because she hit a growth spurt since the last time I bought her shoes and didn't realize her size was different. The shoes were true to size and they're an average width. If your baby has bigger feet (wider or thicker height) these aren't going to work. The fabric is flexible for moving around but it doesn't stretch to fit.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: my daughter love these shoes, cute and lots of cushion

reviewText: For the price, no complaints on the quality, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars. However, it didn't fit.  I am 5.7" to 5.8" about 185 lbs. I wear a 14 or 16 pants and large to xl shirts, my bra size is 38 c or d. The suit fit OK width wise everywhere but the chest, it was a little tight on the girls than I would have liked, although that too could be due to how short it was.  The big problem was the length.  I know this is an Asian remake, but I'd hoped they adjusted the length to better fit American women, but it doesn't seem that way. The suit is 12" from the top to the hip. I needed another inch or two in length to fit my frame.  It is an adorable suit though, I certainly wish I could keep it! Oh, & the little buttona are adorable, but they are single stitched on. So I'd suggest reinforcing them before you go swimming.

reviewText:
I don't really consider myself a collector of hats, but I do have a LOT of hats that I've gathered through the years. I was very pleased when this one arrived. I didn't even have to take it out of the plastic bag to tell this one was a quality item. Just by the weight alone you can tell this is very well made. The stitching is very tight with no loose threads. The acrylic material is very heavy duty and thick. I really like the hats that have the adjustable buckles on the back instead of plastic snaps or the ones made with Velcro. The adjustable buckle adds even more quality to an already great product. Everything else aside, the greatest feature about this hat is the logo. It is done with quality stitching and not something that is just heat applied. The letters really stand out. They are crisp, white and perfectly aligned. I'm not familiar with this company, but if all of their products are of this quality I will certainly be doing more business with them in the near future. If I could give it 6 stars I would.
I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review, and, as with all such review items, I used it long enough to get a feel for how good, bad or mediocre it is. If it seems that I only give 4 or 5 stars on my reviews it's because I tend to review only the 4-5 star items, which is why my reviews of samples tend to lean a little higher. I will often use a product for a number of weeks or a month, in order to learn its operation and get a feel of its longevity. I'm always open to questions in the comments section about it. I take pride in my reviewing process and hope it helps one in making a decision. I tend to choose to review products that I actually want and that I will use on a daily basis so that I can provide a thorough and honest feedback on the product. If this review has been of any help in decision making, please vote YES below. Thanks for your time.

This is an attractive watch and extremely lightweight, made of bamboo that has been colored pink. The streaky pink and wood appearance is eye-catching and unique. The watch comes with its battery installed and a little tab to pull before you set it and start it working.  It keeps good time.

There is a film disk over the face of the watch to protect it. If you don't know it's there, it's easy to miss it and makes the watch face appear less clear. Once this is removed, the face is clear and unscratched. There is a design on the face of the watch that is kind of hard to discern, and hash marks that indicate minutes around the perimeter of the watch face. I believe it is a bamboo design, which makes sense since the watch is made of bamboo. I would prefer it if the design and the hash marks were a bit darker and easier to make out.

The watch band is long for me and I will need to take it to my jeweler to adjust it before I can wear it. The closure, the hands, and the time-setting adjuster are all black plastic. To me, the black plastic cheapens the look of the watch a bit. My watch band also has some rough edges on some of the bamboo pieces, which I will need to sand down or live with. While this watch is different, it is similar to many wooden watches I've seen on the market lately, and the price point of this watch at the time of this review seems on the high side to me.

I received the bamboo watch at a discount in return for my honest review. My reviews are done in compliance with Amazon's TOS and FTC regulations, and I never guarantee a favorable review. I have personally tested this product.

reviewText: I really want to like these pants. I ordered the small, and they fit a bit loose (which is fine.) FTR I am 5'6" and 115 lbs. The material they are made with is fairly heavy and seems of good quality. the design is nice and I like all the hardware and zippers. These pants look good. a couple of the zippers are just for show and are very difficult to zip/unzip. I washed these pants in hot water to try to shrink them up a bit, and two snaps fell off in the very first wash (one of the lower pockets and one of the back pockets). I don't own a snap tool so I don't think I can reattach them. there are two "bands" near the top of the thighs (think of the oldschool carpenter pants- they seem like straps from which to hang a hammer or other tool), that are kind of weird. they will be sticking out either to the outside or toward the crotch, depending on what you do with them. It is a bit strange. I really wish these had held up in the wash, because i do like the cut and style a whole lot. They are just what I wanted for work and for performing or going out to shows. I just wish the snaps hadn't fallen off so easily. who knows what will happen in the second wash. At a $30 price point, i wanted these pants to hold up a bit better. It is likely that I will still wear these fairly often.
summary: I want to love these pants, but...

This is my first time ordering diamond earrings online and I read hundreds of reviews for various items to make sure I was getting the best quality for my money. I wanted something small to wear on a daily basis since I don't own any earrings (except one old diamond stud) and like the simple, classic look of small diamond studs that go with everything. In the past I had worn princess cut diamond studs from Helzberg but I lost one and kept the other in my jewelry box for years. When these new diamond studs from Amazon arrived, I opened my jewelry box to compare size and quality. Size wise these new diamond earrings from Amazon are about the same as my old stud earring from Helzberg (although the shape is different). Color and clarity wise, these new earrings from Amazon blow the old diamond out of the water! I've never worn screwbacks before, and I rarely wear earrings, so it took me about 10 minutes to gently push them through my ears. One of the backs was bent, but that wasn't a dealbreaker so I decided to keep them. I have included a photo of the new studs on my ears and also a side-by-side photo comparing my low quality mall diamonds to the new sparkly ones from Amazon. The difference is pretty amazing, and the price was about the same (though I bought the mall studs about 10 years ago, so they'd probably cost more now). Overall I would say these are a great deal, and I only subtracted one star for the bent backing.
summary: 1/3 CT TW Diamond Studs, Excellent Value

I attached this to my key chain with my most frequently used cards so that I could throw the whole lot in a diaper bag and not have one more thing to carry. I kept it quite slim so that I could also fit it in a cycling jersey pocket when I was out riding. Over time, I have been able to ditch the diaper bag on most occasions but have continued using this. I have added more cards and usually have 10 or so in there. It could fit one or two more if needed.

Early on, I was concerned because there was some fraying on the webbing that attaches the ring to the wallet. However, I have now owned this  for nearly two years and it is still strong. The silicone bead on the inside of the elastic is beginning to wear off in spots after all this time, but I haven't had any problems with slipping even though I frequently shove the wallet into my pants pockets to carry it.

At this point, I will happily purchase another wallet when I feel that this one is finished. It has been well worth the price I paid; I don't think I have ever used another wallet so much.

Neat little wallet.  It arrived super-quick, looks great, and is the slimmest wallet I own.  I was really glad to find it in black leather.  I attached a tile to it,and it's still almost undetectable in my front pocket.  Love it!
summary: Great buy on good-looking minimalist wallet!

reviewText:
I really love the minimalist-style of Crabby wallets.  I had a fabric wallet that I used last year and leather is more my style, so I picked one of these up when I was sure I was sticking to the "minimalist" style.

I love this much more than the fabric version. Leather feels a little thin, but I think it will be strong enough to hold my stuff without breaking.

Thanks for offering a leather version!
summary: I really love the minimalist-style of Crabby wallets

reviewText: Good slim wallet.
Junk.  The stitching is coming undone after afew weeks of use.  It's not Crabby.  It's Crappy.

Good as a wallet;  the strap is strong and durable.  I keep a tile slim locator in one side and it sticks up enough so the speaker is not covered.
However, the tiny bit of fabric holding the ring is just that - tiny.  Attaching keys to it quickly resulted in it tearing off.

reviewText: I love the minimalism of this wallet; but for what it is, its a bit pricey. The leather used came very dry and had cracks in it. I rubbed some coconut oil on it to moisturize it a bit, but the cracks remain. I otherwise very much like this wallet.

reviewText: So this wallet is absolutely fantastic.  Small for factor. The band hold up really well (if you don't accidentally wash it. Just don't accidentally run it through the washing machine

reviewText:
I have recently been adding to my jewelry collection and felt this might be a nice, even if it's costume jewelry, piece to add to the collection. I received it and opened it up and found that the ring was an adjustable one, in adjusting it to fit my finger the silk rose came unglued from the top and now I have to try to remove the large glob of what appears to be a glue stick and try to glue the rose back to the ring. The ring itself is smaller, I wear an 7.5-8 ring and it pinches my finger unless it's opened up too wide to be comfortable and fit properly. The bracelet part is made for small wrists and fits my 7 year old better than it does me. The entire bracelet and ring fit her better than they do on me and I have a small bone structure, so my wrists are not large. I don't feel that this would hold up to wear & tear at all, maybe to be worn for very short occasions if it was reinforced with glue before wearing it (or if yours is already glued well). I am still providing 3 stars because I think for a very small boned woman it would be a nice wear for a costume party or as costume jewelry. The beading is delicate and the lace is exceptionally feminine.

Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I have provided my review and the star rating based on my personal experience, which is not affected by the cost of the item. I have no affiliation with the company or its employees and always welcome feedback, positive and negative and questions.

This is a nice accessory if you are into vintage or Gothic fashions. It fit my hand very comfortably from the ring finger up to my wrist. The lace is very dainty looking with antique brass looking metal charms hanging down from it, then there is 3 black plastic beads hanging from the charms. Down to the ring is metal vines with black plastic beads attached. Then on the bottom is a brass looking adjustable ring with a rose made of satin material. The satin fabric is concerning because it will not hold up well over a long period of time. This is not a waterproof accessory and would get damaged easily when washing hands. After hooking the chain closed on my wrist there was quit a bit of chain sill dangling down, long and I would have to use it on my less dominant hand so it would not dangle into my food. Overall it looks pretty cool and my granddaughter will be thrilled with it because of the goth look. I don't think I would pay much more than $5.00 because it seems more of a costume piece and not something that will hold up under much wear. I am not affiliated with the seller or Amazon and only give my unbiased opinion on an item after I have received it and tried it. I lost a very expensive pair of prescription sunglasses and needed a quick replacement. I really like the Ray-Ban boyfriend sunglasses but didn't want to spend the money so I did a search by the Ray-Ban item number and these came up. I couldn't get the exact measurements from the RB website to confirm, but these looked like a close enough match. I would normally never buy a pair of sunglasses without trying them on first, but for $15 I figured it was worth a shot - especially since they're polarized. I have a very thin, oval shaped face and they are just a little bit too wide to be a perfect fit but I actually really love them. My boyfriend has a more round, almost square shaped face and these look really good on him so he is going to be getting a pair also. They came with the cleaning cloth as pictured AND a nice flexible case (that goes flat when empty) which I wasn't expecting, so this was money well spent! I did read a review about the tortoise color peeling so I went with the black, but I might give the other color a shot anyway since they're so cheap.

Glasses came in today. Awesome look and polarized makes a difference. Not a 5 because one arm is tight to open and close and the other arm is loose. Makes me a little nervous. Still very nice glasses. I'll take my chances.

First of all i only gave them 3 stars because they are made in china which i already knew and second of all they are not real ray bans which i actually have 3 pairs at the moment but i just liked the rhodos style of these and didn't want to spend $140 on another pair of original made in italy by luxotica ray bans and third reason is i think the pair they sent me were returned by someone else cause the glasses had no plastic covering them, no tags on the lens like any glass i have ever bought before specifying that they are uv 400 ptotection, polarized e.t.c, not one label whatsoever anywhere, they did come in a box and the sunglass pouch and cleaning cloth, but anyway the sunglasses are very well made for the price and they fit my face perfectly, 50mm, i also have 54mm from other brands which are just slightly bigger but not too noticeable if you have a bigger face you can go with that size, but all in all great purchase, my wife loved them and they didn't break the bank, i will probably order the black ones with the light green frame, i don't necessarily need to wear glasses that have a name logo on the outside all the time, a person who dresses very trendy and stylish can wear a pair of $10 glasses and make them look way more expensive than someone with a $300 pair of versace's who has no goddamm "sense of style"!!
summary: Very nice glasses at a great price
