reviewText:
Giving these 2 stars. I like the style of this bra. Especially because its for breast feeding. But unfortunately its very uncomfortable. I am a 38 c or 36 D and I ordered this back in December since i needed some support while i was pregnant. I washed the bras and tried them on and the padding was very uncomfortable on my breasts which were senstive due to my pregnancy not only that but the cup was just not big enough either. I decided to put them away and try them once I gave birth and needed to breast feed. Fast forward a month ago I try them on again since i need breastfeeding bras and still bra is uncomfortable especially now since my breasts are even more sensitive.
 So these bras give no support. You can put the straps up high and the bra just starts to sag down. Now If your breasts are heavy obviously they will sag with the bra and thus making them useless. Also I do not have huge breasts, i would say they are average size and the XL size did not support or even cover my breast well. I still wear these once in awhile when I go out just because i need a bra that i can use to breast feed until i can find ones that work well and feel comfortable but besides that they're just taking up space. I get more support from a light weight sports bra then these. I really wanted to like these bras because of the cute style but ultimately wasted money on really uncomfortable bras that need to be made better.

Surprisingly good quality. Has separated slots for money and whatnot. It's much better than expected for a novelty item. Gf was a little concerned about the bow falling off from going in and out of her purse, but so far so good. She's a big Sailor Moon fan, so she loved the design of being related but not blatant about it being a Sailor Moon item.

Wallet came a day early and undamaged, and looks just like it does in the photos. The fabric and stitching are well-done, nothing loose or out-of-place. I'm satisfied with the color and body overall, and the main pocket spaces are large enough to fit (and zip up with) my iPhone 6+, even with a case on it!

My only issue is that the wallet doesn't have some of the features listed. There are 8 card slots instead of 12 (and I can confirm that they're a little tight, as others have mentioned), and there is no clear view slot (not a big deal for me, though I admit I would've liked a clear view slot to showcase photos). Also, the two center-most pocket divisions are not sewn into the bottom of the wallet, so there's a small gap beneath them. I don't have any huge issue with this, but it's worth noting.

Conclusively, it's a well-made wallet. Haven't taken it out to test durability or anything (I'm a student with a heavy bag and a testy route around school, so we'll see), but it seems as if it'll hold up, as there aren't any loose threads or stitchings that might pose a problem. If there are any changes, I will update my review accordingly.
summary: Cute and well-made, but lacking a couple of features.

These Formeu Low Cut socks are quite comfortable and I hardly notice them at all. I've been wearing them a few days now, to work, grocery shopping, and walking around. They're stretchy, breathable and easy to put on and take off. I had no problem with the heel slipping off like I experienced with other low cut socks. There's a small piece of silicone to keep the sock on your heel. For this reason, they cannot be dried in a dryer or ironed because the heat will damage the silicone piece. They can be washed in a washing machine though. For reference, I'm an 8.5 US Men's. My choice of footwear right now is a pair of crocs Unisex Citilane Clog. It's summer here and with shorts, going out in public wearing anything other than no-sock with these shoes makes me look very dorky. I don't like going barefoot into the Crocs because they're not breathable and the bottom starts to feel "gummy" after a while. The top of my pinky toe also scrapes against the inside of the shoe, so it's very uncomfortable without socks. This product takes care of all that. I don't have any complaints right now about these socks. I've washed half of them in my normal laundry and let them air dry. No problems whatsoever. I'll update my review should I have anything new to report. Test unit provided for evaluation. Questions or feedback? Please leave them in the comments section.
summary: Very comfortable and not once did they slip off my heel

reviewText: Not sure why this isn't advertised as unisex.  I wear these with my Toms shoes and they work great.  A little large for me at Size 8 feet.  Front fits but some room in back that gets bunched up.  Soft and doesn't irritate my skin.  The different colors are helpful in matching with my different shoe colors.  Comes up far enough so it doesn't slip around.  Works.  Wish it was a little smaller in back but it is Mens shoe sizes.  I got this free or at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.  GOOD

There's built-in padding I didn't know about (kid of like a sports bra), which had me excited at first, until I tried it on. The suit itself fits fine, and I could've dealt with the pastel colors, but the padding on the inside was stiff and came way too far down my ribcage to the point where it wasn't even like a bra anymore. I'll never wear this swimsuit, but it might be good for an older person who breasts are a little more affected by gravity than mine.

I ordered this little black nighty as a surprise for my husband, since he deserves a little reward every now and again. At this price point I was a bit skeptical of the quality and frankly did not expect it to be comfortable at all.
I was quite impressed when I opened the package and saw the quality of the material. The main material of this babydoll dress is a nice black sheer mesh material trimmed in satin ribbon and the top is a very pretty flowery designed black lace. The g-string is exactly what you would expect from this type of product. It is simply a triangle of the same sheer material and a couple of pieces of elastic. This portion is really not all that comfortable, but who would expect it to be? Honestly, I usually disregard the g-string and wear a pair of lace boyshorts.
I am 5'6" tall and weigh 168lbs and normally wear a 36DD. I ordered a size extra large according to the size chart and in order to avoid looking like a beached whale caught in a fishnet. If anything I could have gotten a size smaller. The lace kind of gathers in the cups and the skirt part is loose and flowing.
The shoulder straps are elastic and slide adjustable so you have a lot of leeway to adjust the sizing. It is very comfortable and seems to be of excellent quality. I am very happy with this little nighty and I know my husband will love it too.

reviewText:
I purchased the Cayanland running shoes for my son. These shoes look absolutely adorable on his feet. I'm glad I did, he loves them. I purchased the all black. They fit as expected and have room to grow. The shoe strings aren't long, they are held in place by a stopper. My only concern is that the soles of these shoes are made out of some sort of plastic like material. It doesn't seem extremely sturdy so I'm not sure how long they will hold up. Overall, I would recommend the Cayanland Shoes...for the price.

reviewText:
I am loving the look of this stylish summer dress.  It is very cute in person, and the material is smooth and light weight (made of cotton, polyester, and spandex).  I ordered size large, hoping it would fit like a US size 12/14, and it does.  It fits comfortably, and isn't too tight or loose.  Just right.  So based on my experience, I would say the size chart is accurate, and order your normal size.

The look of this dress is fun and stylish.  It features short sleeves, and navy blue and off white chevron patterns throughout the dress. This color combination is really cute and attractive.  The length of the dress falls just a few inches past my knees, but I think it will differ depending on your height. It may be shorter on taller individuals.  You could also dress this up by adding a belt around the waist, some cute jewelry, a cardigan, or a scarf.

I'm glad this dress is machine washable, although you can also hand wash it. It is recommended to let it hang to dry.  Overall, I am more than impressed by this cute summer dress.  I love the colors, the chevron design, and the comfortable fabric.  Based on all these important factors, I can honestly recommend this product.  I did have the opportunity to receive this product at a discount or for free for an honest evaluation, and this dress exceeded all my expectations.  I would definitely order from this company again!
summary: Very cute dress!! Size chart is accurate!

There was nothing that came with it that mentioned anything about "Orlando Nightclub Gay Pride". I feel that it is shameful to profit from the deaths and heartaches left by the many victims and I will make a personal donation to the proper organization in Orlando, FL. Otherwise, as I said it is a very attractive cap with symbols of man and man and woman and woman dancing happily together. I do not normally buy cheap plastic snapback caps opting for sized or stretch only but I will keep it nonetheless as it is nice looking and would probably cost me more hassle to return it to China. Finally I would urge the seller to donate something to the families of the lost.

reviewText:
I got this purse in 3190 black for my wife for traveling on the airplane or a weekend roadtrip. She was looking for a bigger purse that still had compartments but could fit a lot of items, including her 11" Laptop and her iPad. After receiving it she used it to travel the week after and it certainly fit all the items needed. She appreciates the compartment and small pockets inside the purse and the fact that you can zip it so nothing can fall out or be stolen easily. The handles are long enough to wear it over the shoulder or on your arm, and the shoulder strap is the perfect length to wear it cross body or just hang it off your shoulder. Luckily this purse doesn't have a chemical smell to it, like some other cheaper purses do. My wife did criticized however that it looks cheap in person, the pictures online are certainly well done.
Overall a good large purse for a very reasonable price.
summary: Good large purse for traveling or work

reviewText:
I absolutely love this scarf and I am not a scarf person. It is very soft and flowy. (Not really a word but you get the jest.) It's colors are very soft a delicate. This is a very feminine item that is plenty long enough to fit any women. It looks good with any color. It was easy to order and came relatively quickly. The packaging was pretty thin but the scarf would be hard to damage in shipping so it is adequate packaging for the type of item. This is so luxurious looking. The fabric used to make this is such a soft delicate product. This would make a very nice gift or something nice to use for a way to dress up an outfit without a lot fuss. I also liked that there were several choices of patterns to choose from. Unfortunately, my pictures do not do this scarf justice.

I did receive this item at a discounted price or free in exchange for my review of the product. This however, did not affect my opinion of this item. I love this scarf and will be ordering more of them. It is a great value for the price and well worth paying full price. I had no issues with the seller and ordering from them was easy. I would recommend ordering from them and I will order from them again in the future.
summary: Wonderful scarf. I love to wear it.

reviewText: Nice, lightweight and elegant scarf.  I purchased the "blue" colored scarf.  It came packaged well without any damage.  The item ships from China so took longer than most Amazon items, but if you plan for this, then that is not a problem.  This is a perfect spring or summer scarf.  It has cheery, feminine colors and lightweight.  I personally like the scarf because it's lightweight and feels clean and "easy" to wear.  I don't like real heavy scarfs that are thick in the back around your neck and make your hair stick out.  This is very comfortable and not scratchy or itchy at all.  It's of a good length to wrap in several different knots of your choosing  or to just hang loosely.  I do love the lightweight feature of this scarf; however,  this does make it more fragile and time will see how well it holds up.  You will probably need to take greater care in washing it.  I will just handwash and allow it to air dry.  So if you are looking for a lightweight scarf, I would definitely recommend this.  If you like thicker scarves or are rough on your clothing, I would probably pass.  This product was supplied to me for Free/discounted price by the vendor to utilize and assess it for their clients. My evaluation is honest and true and is in no way impacted by the seller. If the product is not as described or is flawed I hold the right to post a negative review.

This scarf is soft weight and light as described, but it is a little thinner and see-through than I was expecting. In the sellers photos it appeared less see-through and silkier looking. It has more of a chiffon feel to me.  I ordered the blue floral print, which is nice for spring and summer. The stitching is nice around the edging. I do agree with others that this may be a little over priced for the quality. It takes a little long for shipping, but it did arrive earlier than expected it came in 15 days. I will definitely wear this scarf to summer outings though. I purchased this item at a discount for an honest review. I do not think I would purchase another one unless the price was lower.
summary: it is thinner than expected and see-through

reviewText:
I ordered the blue/multi-color scarf.  It is a very soft airy scarf with a lot of variety of pastel colors.  The scarf that I received was of a light garden/flower pattern.  It is a lovely scarf to wear with your summer wardrobe.  The scarf is a nice size, about 63 inches long and 19 inches wide.  But I want to make sure you know the scarf is sheer, which is exactly what a summer scarf should be.  If it were any heavier, if would not be comfortable to wear in the warm summer months.
It took forever to get this product as it ships from China, so if you are needing something within a specific timeframe, this product is not for you.  In the description of the scarf, it states that it is made of Georgette, but a tag on the item says 100% Silk Feeling Polyester.  I would hand wash this scarf and dry flat. I noticed several others folks mentioned that the stitching on their scarf was not done correctly, fortunately, that was not my experience.  The only thing I would have to say, is this scarf is a bit over-priced for what you are getting.
I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for a fair, unbiased opinion. I love the scarf, it is exactly what I was looking for, but I would not have been happy with the price I was charged, for the type of product I received. Thank you for taking the time to read my review.
summary: A bit over-priced for what you are getting

If someone were short like me, and were to size up, they might be able to get them to fit right, and then they might be the perfect pant. P.S. The black shirt fits fine but I know once wet it'll cling to my skin so again, it wouldn't be flattering for my body. The suit had no flaws on it though. No strings hanging, nothing messed up. I just wish the waist part of the bottoms fit a bit better and the top had a bit more support. Other than that, it's a cute bathing suit for someone that is more toned up that doesn't have a little muffin top. *I received this product free in exchange for an honest review*

The concept of this swimsuit is nice but the execution fails to work for my female body. I ordered a size L (size 8-10), yet there were zero tags on the swimsuit to indicate/reassure me that I had received the size that I ordered.

The top was too large for a 36C bra size yet the bottoms were too small for a size 8 jeans. The over tank was very large and baggy. reviewText:
I've worn this shirt a couple times since buying it. Overall I like it and am happy with purchasing it. It's lightweight and has a nice flowing movement to it. It's definitely not super clingy. Very comfortable to wear and looks great on. I would order a size up though just to be safe. There's one major con.... I've worn this probably 4 times since buying. I hand washed it too. Product received at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Let me start by saying that I received this product at a discount. I want to be upfront with that, and add that I only accept products that I think Ill like and have no problem with giving a negative review if the product warrants it. If the product fails to meet expectations later, or holds up even better than Id hoped, Ill update.

I purchased this top for my lovely wife, and she loves it. She is headed out on a trip tonight, and was in the middle of packing when we got the package. She tried it on, gushed over it, and said "This is coming with me." Coming from her, it really doesn't get much better than that!

The material is light, soft, and flowing; but it isn't so light that it is see through. She tells me that it was a very comfortable fit, and very comfortable fabric. She loves the lacy top too which shocked me because she doesn't usually go for that kind of thing. We'll see how it holds up over time, but the seams look good, and while the fabric isn't anything like denim, I expect it to hold up fairly well under regular usage. You know, unless it snags on something, but that is just the risk you ladies take to look and feel good.

So all in all the shirt feels good to her and it makes her feel good. I can't ask for more or give it higher praise, except to say that I think she looks great in it too.

We purchased this dress a few weeks ago.  I have tried other WeeUrban products and just had to get one of their dresses for my little girl.  The price is pretty steep for my taste but I know it's better quality and I liked that it was 100 percent cotton.  I was worried, initially about it shrinking after washing and drying several times but we haven't had any issues.  My daughter loves all things bugs so this honey bee design was perfect for her. I love how simple their designs are on their dresses yet they really stand out. My little girl has requested to wear it on multiple occasions already.  So far we've only used it in warm weather and some cooler mornings with a little white cardigan over it.  I think it would be adorable in the fall with a pair of black or white leggings too.  Next to the simple picture designs that are bold and beautiful, I love the ruffled neckline.  It is way too cute.  The dress seems comfortable on my daughter. She hasn't complained at all.  It's soft to the touch and something I wish would become available for adults to wear too.  How cute would Mommy and Me dresses be?!  My daughter has also learned that she could twirl in the dress and she has fun spinning around til she is too dizzy to do so anymore.  It's quite funny to watch. If it doesnt come out of the dryer right away, it wrinkles easy so make sure you are on top of that dryer when it stops!! Otherwise, we are fans and love our Organic WeeUrban "Bee the Change" dress.

These glasses are a good deal, considering they include both a pouch and a cleaning cloth. However, considering its low price, they are not the best in quality. These glasses are a bit flimsy, therefore the temples can easily bend if not handled carefully.

Because these glasses are polarized, they also give off a colorful effect when looking at an LCD screen. This can be frustrating at times, as the rainbow effect can be straining to the eyes. When not looking at screens, however, the lenses are completely fine. The tint isn't very dark, though it is enough to protect your eyes from the sun.

Overall, I'd give 4.5 stars for the appearance of the glasses, and 3.5 for the quality. With careful handling, they can be worthwhile. Despite the frames being a bit small for my face, I am looking forward to trying out other colors.
summary: Stylish and trendy; very similar to the round Ray Bans.

reviewText: This is a very well made pair of jeans.  I have been looking for a pair of lined jeans that were not relaxed (i.e. baggy) but could not find anything.  I had tried on several pair at various outdoor stores and they are all big enough for two people.  I wanted something that would not be baggy when tucked into boots and these are the closest I could find.  The fit in the waist is about the same as Levi's 511's so order based on that.  They are still a little baggy in the seat and crotch, but otherwise better than most others.  I am 5'10, 160lbs, and had to have them shortened because they come in about a 34 inch inseam.  While they are being shortened, I also had the legs tapered so they look better in boots which is how they are likely to be worn in the winter.  The extra cost for the tailoring is well worth it because there is little you can do with a "relaxed fit" pair to eliminate the baggy appearance.  I washed them first to see how much they would shrink (disregard the poorly written washing instructions on the cards attached to the jeans and just wash them on cold and dry in the dryer at very low temperature).  Do turn them inside out before washing.  It takes about 3 to 4 weeks to get them because they come from China, but these are the best I have found.  The reason for only 4 stars is that they should fit tighter in the seat area, at least on me. Looking forward to wearing them the rest of the winter.

A pretty steel bracelet with a beautiful message inscribed. This is a great message to keep on hand to read during times of weakness and to give you strength. There is a tiny steel heart attached at the end of one chain. I have tiny wrists and this doesn't fit me as well as I was hoping it would. It can be adjusted to fit, but I am left with a lot of chain hanging down. (update a few hours after this review: my husband used wire cutters and easily clipped off the excess chain. Of course I lost the adorable heart in the process, but now I can wear this bracelet and it fits me perfectly) The great detail about this bracelet is that both of the chains can be completely removed from the steel message plaque (it is attached with lobster claw attachments). So if you would rather have a leather bracelet that would look great as well with this steel plaque. This bracelet comes in a beautiful velveteen gifting box which is specifically made for bracelets. It makes a beautifully presented message and gift for someone. I received this bracelet at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Very cute and with a beautiful message

reviewText:
I love this bracelet and love the inspirational quote on it even more! The bracelet is simple and about the quality you would expect for the price (similar to something you would buy at Target or Walmart). However, I love that it has a few different clasps for adjusting it so that it will perfectly fit any arm size. you also have the option to remove the bracelet part of it and string it through a necklace if you prefer. In my pictures, I have one picture showing how I looped the heart end of the bracelet back up and clipped it to the edge of the quote plaque.

The actual quote plaque measures about 1.75" W x 0.5" H. It is also slightly curved and sits nicely on my wrist.

I'm a medical student and plan on practicing medicine in rural/underserved areas of the country. This particular inspirational quote is very near and dear to my heart, as I have it posted above my desk to give me strength through some of the tougher parts of school. I think it will also be an excellent quote and reminder to tell some of my patients who are going through tough times in their life and need an extra boost in confidence and motivation. Overall, EXCELLENT product and purchase with a very special message!! :)

***Discounted product received for testing and review purposes. No compensation was received, and all opinions are my own and were not influenced by the seller in anyway.

These are one of the most comfortable sunglasses I have ever worn. It's seriously feather light at only 0.9 oz, and the nose pads move and adjust at just the right angle to sit on my nose without sliding down. I was offered these in exchange for my unbiased review, but I'm so impressed by these inexpensive eye wears, especially because they look fantastic and the lenses are actually great! I feel motion sickness when lenses have distortions, but with these on, I could look around all I want without seeing/feeling any distortions that tend to make me feel dizzy, and the lenses are definitely polarized as you could see in my photos. I feel like I've been wasting hundreds per pair for the Oak*, Maui J*, etc., for the sake of brand names for too many years. If you like the aviator look of these, you should absolutely try the pair at such low price!

reviewText: good value and don't need to worry about losing them

These sunglasses are lightweight, but don't feel cheap. The sides are thin and you do not notice them on on your ears or pinching the sides of your head.  They also did not but a lot of weight or pressure on my nose.  It felt like i did not have glasses on. I wore them at the pool and could read my novel without any squinting or eye fatigue from trying to read in the sun.  Then I wore them at a soccer game. The glasses totally took away the glare from the sun that was shining right in my eyes.  They did not distort colors like some polarized glasses.  These are a great buy for the price.  I would purchase these again, but in a different color.  I ordered the silver and felt a little silly with the mirrored glasses. I think these were a little to shiny for my taste. reviewText: I was not completely satisfied with my initial sunglasses, however the outstanding customer service team took extra measures to make sure I would be completely happy with my next pair. I now have the gold framed aviators with blue lens. It's a little large for my face, however I really like the color contrast and also that I know I will get complete coverage from sun in my eyes. I love the case they come with. I think with a great company who cares about their customers, you are bound to be satisfied.
Nice

I really like these sunglasses a lot! It meets my needs as far as it protecting my eyes and the fact that they are Polarized makes it even better! I love the fact that the nose pads don't leave a mark on my nose and that these actually stay on my face since they are pretty lightweight! The 2 things I do have to worry about are scratching the lens and poking my eye out with the tips of the "Temples" (Long arms on the sides of the frame) where I could easily poke my eye or someone for that matter. Overall, it's stylish and does the job!

These sunglasses are great to wear when driving in sunny conditions.
The blue tint reduces glare and allows for crisp visual of the road.
For what it is worth, I could read my cell phone display while wearing
them.  Most sunglasses are too dark and reduce visibility overall.

The style reminds me of what I recall Brad Pitt wearing in a movie or
a magazine or, yes, by a Georgia State Patrol Officer.  Either way,
they style is classic alpha male.

While I will continue to wear these sunglasses, I prefer the wrap
around style.  The wrap around style provides glare protection on the
periphery while driving and especially for outdoor athletics. The frame is
metal. And while that gives the glasses a classic and more expensive feel
it can catch on your hair when you pull them up and have several parts that
can come loose.

These glasses were free for review and evaluation.

I normally don't like aviator styles for glasses. However, this unique shape and look makes this look very different from what I was expecting. The lens is chiseled to that there are small gaps between the lens and the frame. It really is unique and the bright blue lens is quite striking. These still feel lightweight and comfortable on your face although they are quite stylish. The frame is metal and feels durable, like it won't bend easily--which is great. The blue contrasted against the metal gives these a retro feel and I can guarantee heads will turn in your direction. Pros: 1) they're lightweight 2) the lenses are large and cover a large portion over your eyes to protect it from the sun in different angles. 3) the shape is unique and the color is bold 4) they're comfortable Cons: 1) none so far These are great for when you're outdoors, when you're at the lake or the beach. I didn't wear glasses for a while, but these are my new "go to" pair. Please check out my video review pending approval. I received this for free, but all of my thoughts and opinions are 100% my own and not influenced by anyone in any way.
summary: Striking and they have such a beautiful blue color!

I gave it to an 11 year old who wears a double zero in jeans and it fit her fine, it was just a little bit short. She loved the bright neon pink color. It is lined and the inside is like a white mesh. The outside fabric is has no stretch or give to it at all. It is spaghetti strapped and it had a cute little design tied into the back at the top. It looked almost like macrame. It was made into the racerback design of the dress. I wish it had fit but unfortunately it did not and there is no size large enough to fit me. They are definitely Asian sizes and on the much smaller end of the size spectrum. I removed on star for the size chart being posted nowhere before I ordered.

reviewText: I returned it. Fitting not good

This is s super cute summer dress that is lightweight and airy. This dress came well packaged in two envelopes and surprisingly was not too terribly wrinkled. The dark blue was a really nice color and did not really show the wrinkles. The wrinkles came out by steam ironing them. This dress is a very lightweight material that is not the softest but feels like your typical chiffon summer cover up dress. I think that if it were to be worn with a bandeau then it could be worn as a normal dress too. The material is a little see-through, but it pretty dark for the most part. As someone who is 5'1, this dress came down above my knees and was about shorts length. It was almost too short, but it was also really loose. There isn't a category on Amazon for too small and too big. Regardless, I think that it's perfect as a coverup and I would wear it as a normal dress if the length was longer and it was not so loose up at the top. I did like the design in the back and enjoyed the dark blue color.

I received this Ninimour Women's' Chiffon Spaghetti Straps Beach Coverup at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review. This review is entirely unbiased and is not dependent on my discounted price. I hope that this review has been helpful to you!
summary: Perfect for summer, lightweight, airy, cute!

Bought size small for my 46"/50# 5.5year old. It was perfect! Shipped from China with an 8/2-8/18 arrival date. Received 7/20

First off be aware of the shipping time. It took a lot time for mine to arrive it looks like it is available via prime now so that might not be a problem anymore. I mean technically the time it took to ship was not a problem for me but I just wanted to warn anyone that might want this item for a specific occasion and whatnot. I read other reviews that said this item ran small for them but it runs large for me around the underarm area. I am Asian and all these other reviews talks about it being Asian sized and whatnot but that wasn't true for me. I normally wear between a S or M depending on the article of clothing so I ordered a S for this dress and it ended up being quite loose around the under arm area and it does hang low under the armpits as well. I feel like if I don't wear the right bra for this I will be showing a lot of side boob. I think in order for me to wear this I would need to wear a wrap around bra one of those bandeau bras. Which isn't a super big deal to me because I have one but just FYI. The other thing is I think their coloring names is wrong because as you can see the picture of the "red" dress is more like an orange. I thought maybe that was just a photo issue but it really comes as a neon orange color. But overall it's an okay dress. For the price I'm not going to be super picky about it. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I just lost my RayBans in Mexico, and after watching the Luxottica monopoly video by 'Adam ruins everything', I decided to not buy any Luxottica brands (including RayBans). So, this is a perfect NOT Luxottica brand with good quality for the prices that the glasses should cost if there was no monopoly in the market. I like these, they're sturdy and seem to be very good quality.

UPDATE (2 stars): After only 3 months or so, the hinges became super loose and I wasn't able to make them tighter even when I tighten up the screws, this glass is useless.

UPDATE2 (3 stars): The customer service reached out to me and offered to send a new pair for free since I had a bad experience, which is great and I would have loved to update my review to 5 stars, but the hinges on the new pair I received are way too tight and they rattle and crackle when I open and close them as if they need some lubrication. These are nice glasses, if only they can figure out how to work the hinges.

reviewText: This is a joke, right?

Im pleasantly surprised with this bra top!  The fit and support of this is nice, and the quality is average  no complaints there!  Im a 36DD and normally wear VS underwire lightly lines bras.  The underwire helps keep things up and in placeones Ive tried without it don't do much for me.  I belly dance and many tops are decorated bras, but sometimes I need something with a bit more coverage for family events.  Ive been looking for something in this basic style for a while and was excited to see this. Im easily able to wear my bra under it and if tucked right, it not be shown.  In the photos I wore a pink bra so that you could easily see the lines.  There are some photos with me not wearing the bra tooIm SO impressed that I could totally wear this for a performance without a bra underneaththats so rare!  The bra does have removable linersI prefer them in so I don't have headlight issues.  At my chest size I wouldnt wear this for exercise without a bra, but light yoga maybe (Im not a yoga person, but imagine its not a lot of bouncing) or around the house for sure.  I generally wear a large or x-large topIve gained a little weight so Id lean on the XL side, so with Chinese fitting, the XXX-Large was the right choice for me.  Im pleased with this product and would recommend it!

This cardigan is incredibly comfortable to wear. I have really been looking forward to fall weather, and as soon as I tried this cardigan on for the first time I got even more excited for fall. I could wear this every day! The color of this cardigan is a really light grey. I love light grey and I am a firm believer that everyone looks good in this color. I love the design of both the collar and the sleeves on this cardigan. The collar is nice and wide so it drapes past the back of your neck which is a really nice touch. The extra fabric on the collar is not even noticeable while I am wearing it. The sleeves are such a great length. I have had issues in the past with sleeves not being long enough, but these sleeves are truly just right. The sleeves go just past my wrists and fit the width of my arms perfectly. I find the length of the cardigan to be exactly as I had hoped it would be. It hangs past my back flows nicely as opposed to being super clingy to my back and bottom. In fact, the entire cardigan feels super nice and flowy which I truly believe contributes to it's overall great look and comfortable feel. The front of the cardigan on both sides rests easily on my chest when left open, but the fabric of each side can easily be pulled across my chest if desired. I love absolutely everything about this cardigan so far. The look, the feel and the size have all impressed me. I would highly recommend this cardigan to family and friends; it is truly a must have for fall. I have not had any issues with this cardigan at all but I will be sure, as always, to return to update my review if I do end up running into any issues. Please note that I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions within this review are my own and I am in on way obligated to leave a positive review.
summary: This Cardigan has me Itching for Fall Weather! Beautiful!

reviewText:
I have to say, these sunglasses were a very pleasant surprise. I originally wanted to get these because they're unusual and quirky looking, and very reminiscent of the famous style icon Iris Apfel, whose documentary I recently watched. I kind of fell in love with her signature look of wearing big, circular glasses and wanted to try them out for myself. Once I started wearing these sunglasses, they proved to be very comfortable and much more functional than I expected. The large, round frames really do feel so comfortable on my face. reviewText:
Curvy women are going to love this dress, as it will show off your hour glass shape. But, the larger busted, less shapely woman may also find this the perfect dress.

I am one of the unfortunate larger busted ladies that wear one size up top and another size on the bottom. I have a large waist and small hips. Subsequently, it is difficult to find a dress that looks or fits well. Therefore, I usually would never attempt to buy a dress online, unless it was a top and skirt separate. However the style and available colors of this dress just captured my imagination. I think shoes and accessories could offer both a casual and dressy look. I hate short sleeves; and over the knee hemlines do not look age appropriate for me. Deep V necklines are best for large bust lines and 3 quarter sleeves are what I like.  So, this dress seemed at first glance the perfect one on which to take a chance.

First I ordered the dress in an XL, (bust 41.5 to 43). The dress was too small and way too short ( I am 5'4"). BUT I loved the dress. So I reordered. This time I ordered the dress in a 1X (bust 42 to 43) to better fit my bust, a 42, and found the top fit perfectly, but the waist portion, which fits as an empire, was too large by about 2 or 3 inches. I can easily have this portion of the dress tailored since it can be hidden in the side seams of the ruched empire band or I can address this with an elastic belt. The belt will add a little detail, and either remedy will add shapeliness to my otherwise mostly straight silhouette. I bought the Royal Blue and Fuchsia; both colors have elastic belts with lovely fabric bows in matching colors available on Amazon.

I like the front ruching and delicate gathers as they hide my flaws without adding bulk and look still stylish. The hemline is perfect, just below the knee but showing the curve of the leg so I don't look boxy, or thick legged. I might have the dress hemmed to mid knee for slightly more current look that can still look conservative, dressy, and modern. The pockets are not bulky and very deep, so they can actually be used. Great for parties when you just need a lipstick and your phone. The dolman sleeves make moving or lifting your arms a breeze - no pulling across the bust or binding under your arms, so there is no chance of your bra accidentally showing. The sleeves fall just below the elbow, a great length for showing off bracelets or a beautiful watch, and for the more mature woman the recommended youthful length. Although the neck line is a deep V, it is still very modest, so you get a sexy look without revealing too much cleavage. I also like the shape of the skirt that is a little narrow at the knee, giving the illusion of a shapelier hip.

The material is lightweight, but not sheer at all. It is a great travel material, or all day work dress that transitions into evening wear since it does not wrinkle. The dress is well made, with no poorly sewn seams, or hanging threads. Delicate cycle in cold water and hang to dry will keep the colors bright and the material beautiful. I am seriously contemplating getting the navy, too. That is how much I like this dress.

I hope this has helped you in making a decision to make the purchase. At this price it is a bargain!
summary: Why the larger busted, less shapely woman may also find this the perfect dress.

reviewText:
I was so excited to see this dress on Amazon!  This looks exactly like the Coach dress on Modcloth, which I absolutely love!  On Modcloth, this is a $60 dress.  I own one of these dresses from Modcloth, that I got on sale for like $40, and I love it.  I've eyeballed the red version of this dress for a long time, but couldn't make myself pay $60 for it.

When I saw this version on Amazon, I was thrilled!  I quickly ordered it, and anxiously awaited its arrival.  The one thing I debated about was the sizing. Their sizing chart indicated that I should get a medium, but I knew that I bought the small from Modcloth and like the fit.  I ended up getting the medium, because I figured the size chart would be more correct than me comparing it to a different dress.  I should have gone with the small.  It's not like the medium is huge, but a small would have been better for me.  I'm still going to keep the medium, and it still looks great, but know that the size chart leads you to a bit bigger dress than it would indicate.  I guess it also comes down to what sort of fit you want.  I like a bit closer fit, and the medium is a bit roomier than I normally wear.

The fabric is thick and of very good quality.  The buttons are sewn securely on, and all the stitching is perfect.  You have no idea how fabulous this dress looks on!  This is one of those styles that flatters all figures.  It looks amazing with tights and a cardigan, too!  This hangs to my knee level - I am 5'3".

W
summary: This is one of those styles that flatters all figures.  I will absolutely be purchasing this dress in the blue, as well!

reviewText:
This dress is awesome. It somehow manages to be stylish and professional at the same time, and I love the neckline because it's interesting but very modest. I have a large tattoo on my chest that comes up to my collarbone, and it is almost impossible to find stylish dresses that hide it for job interviews and the like. So this is a very exciting addition to my wardrobe. The fitted cut and the color I chose (red!) keep it from looking frumpy or boring. Instead it has a kind of classic, mod appeal that I'm super pleased with. Also, pockets! I love dresses with pockets so much.

As other reviewers have said, this dress runs a little large. I don't know if it's a full size larger, but if you're between sizes definitely size down. This is partially due to the fabric, a nice smooth knit with a fair amount of stretch. If the material were stiff, the Medium would have been too tight in the chest and waist for me, but since there is stretch it just has a nicely fitted look and is very comfortable. The A-line skirt is very forgiving. I'm usually a Medium/Large on top and an XL on bottom - damn the pear shape! - but the skirt on the Medium isn't tight at all. So definitely choose your size based on your shape and bust. At 5'2", this dress comes right to my knees; you'd have to be REALLY tall for it to be short enough to be unprofessional on you.

The red color of the dress is a true dark red, very neutral, and works well with the yellow undertone of my skin. It's red enough to be exciting and dark enough to be professional. The quality is very high, with the fabric feeling nice and heavy and the buttons being solid and well affixed. It also comes with one extra button, just in case. I did notice some wrinkles/creases in the fabric when I removed it from the packaging, but I don't think the fabric actually wrinkles easily. That seems to just be a side effect of being packed tight for shipping. I plan to steam it and then take some pictures to reveal it in all its glory.

Basically, buy this dress. It's perfect for going straight from the office to a nice dinner out, or skip the office and go straight to dinner!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review, and it's awesome so I'm feeling pretty smug about it really.

If you add tights and a cute sweater, it could transition to cooler weather as well.
This product was provided to me at a discounted rate for my honest, unbiased review. I rely on reviews for many of my own purchases on Amazon and will review them to the best of my ability.  I especially love to review products that I use often and enjoy on a frequent basis. If you have any questions on the items, feel free to ask!

I am 5'-4" and weight ~120 pounds. I typically wear a US Size 2 or a small in similar women's styles. I ordered the iGENJUN Women's Casual Sleeveless Midi Tour Dress Vintage Dresses in a size Large based on the provided dimensions from the seller. The Large is WAY TOO BIG on me! I am returning the Large and am waiting for a Small to ship. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND ORDERING YOUR NORMAL US SIZE. The dress, although wide, is a great conservative style for the workplace during the summer months. The wide sleeves offer enough coverage to avoid needing a sweater or jacket over the top. The skirt hits mid-thigh and is an appropriate length for work or a date with my husband. I would definitely wear this dress to work on a day when I know I am going out to dinner with my husband. The cowl neck is flattering, yet provides full coverage for my chest. I can't wait to get this dress in the right size and wear it to work! I will post an update on the fit once my new dress arrives.

The style of the dress is exactly as photographed by the seller. The material is a heavy weight jersey cotton material. It is soft against the body. The hems and seams of the dress are all very well constructed and smooth. They do not irritate. There is some stretch to the material, which allows for some play when you order your size. The cotton material is easy care in the washing machine. It washes and dries on normal cycle. The dress includes pockets too, which is a great bonus. I love being able to stick my phone or my work ID into my pocket when I leave my desk on my lunch break. Most of my dresses don't have a place for me to stick these things. Having a pocket is always a great bonus, in my opinion.

Despite my trouble finding the right size originally, I love the style of this dress. It is chic and classic, yet conservative enough to wear to work. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a new addition to their daily work wardrobe. It ships quickly and since it is Prime eligible, is easy to return in the event that the fit is not correct. I recommend ordering your normal US size (disregard the measurements from the seller). This dress makes a great gift for the friends, girlfriends, wives and moms in your life.

Update (7/20/16): I received the dress is my true size (small) and it fits perfectly. The wide sleeves are great to wear to work on a hot summer day. The length is office appropriate. It hits just above the knee. The waist hits at my natural waist. It is snug but not too tight. Same goes for the chest. The elasticity of the material makes for a great fit.

I hope you found this review helpful. If so, I'd appreciate you clicking the "helpful" button!

The fabric was nice and thick but the sizing of the upper portion was simply too large, and the chunky buttons ended up looking cheap in-person. Looked more like children's clothing than a dress intended for adults. The sizing may be more appropriate for those with long torsos.

This dress is super flattering, It hits right at my knee and basically makes me wish it were already fall so I could wear it out. The material is jersey like in softness, but heavier than jersey would be. It has a really nice construction and hang to it. It also has full size pockets which is way too exciting not to share.

I'm 5'4" 120 lbs and a US size 4 and I got this in a size Small and it fits perfectly. Not too loose or skin tight.

The seller shipped everything super fast and I couldn't be more pleased. I received a discount on this dress in exchange for my honest review, hope it was helpful to you guys.

I bought the Coach Tour dress on ModCloth years ago, and it has been my favorite thing to wear. This dress is identical and half the price. It is slightly larger in sizing though, and the pockets are slightly smaller. Nice red color.

This is a beautiful dress for the price. However there are some drawbacks and I will list them as best as I can. First off, for $45.00, you cannot beat the price if you're willing to put a little work into it. The sequins are sewn on a tulle piece which is then sewn onto the dress. This is fine except that they used clear nylon thread which does show up on the navy, not bad, but I noticed it.  I like the fact that you can lace up the back, corset style. It makes fitting it to your body shape very easy. There is a fabric "modesty panel" behind the laces to cover your skin. The lacing is made of the same fabric as the skirt which is a nice match. Beware, a few of the plastic jewels that are sewn on needed repair, but I already knew that due to reviews I read.

This dress runs ridiculously large. I'm 5'8", 36C, 30, 38. I generally wear a Medium/ size 6. From the reviews that I read, people my size recommended ordering a small. This concerned me as most of the dresses on Amazon from China run very small. I usually wear a medium and order larges on Amazon, but I braved it and ordered a small. Boy was I glad I did. I was able to lace it up perfectly, the lacing was not too tight so the back looked nice. I would definitely recommend ordering down a size.

The length of this dress is another story. First off, I love the amount of fabric on this dress. Lots of yardage is used. The skirt is made up of 3 layers and I loved the feel of it. Now for the fun part. As I said, I'm 5'8". In heels, a good 6 feet tall. I tried on this dress, with heels, and I would still need to hem it 12" to 15" which is crazy. The hem was a little uneven, but the fact that I would need to cut and hem 3 separate layers of fabric was a little much. It would be cost prohibitive to have a seamstress hem this due to the sheer mass of fabric. I'm an experienced seamstress and truthfully, I just didn't feel like doing it. So, unfortunately I returned the dress. However, I will most likely reorder this in the future when I have enough time to take on a project of this size. It really is beautiful and would make a lovely formal dress. Hope this helps in your decision making.
summary: Beautiful, but be sure to order a size down

This review isn't going to be long. It is still a keychain, but it's very well made.

The circle that holds the key ring to the tag itself would be the only thing that I would think would worry anyone, but that's with most keychains. The tag and the keychain is very sturdy. I don't see it breaking anytime soon.

It's very shiny, like a mirror finish. It isn't peeling or scuffed. It doesn't seem to just have a mirror finish sticker on it.

The necklace does fit directly into the space on the keychain and is also well made. If you wanted to change the chain on the necklace, it's very easy to do. Neither bends or seem to be weak. The writing is easy to read as well.

It's not an overly big or a too small keychain. The necklace is small like a decorative necklace tends to be.

Not much more I can say other than these are well made.

reviewText:
***This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review***
I purchased this watch as a stocking stuffer for my step daughter (ironic it's time related and the first Xmas related purchase that wasn't made two days before the actual holiday!) I knew she'd love it because even though she's not a girly girl, the band is quite unique and artistic. When I received the watch, I was pleasantly surprised that it far surpassed my expectations. summary: Time is on my side. Yes it is.

reviewText:
This is an adorable watch. However, it is described as a young child's watch and to me the measurements seem to be fit for an adult. The length of the silicon band is 9.5" and the width of the band measures out to be 0.75". The face of the watch measures 1.5". I, as an adult, would wear this watch on the fourth hole (there are eight total). My eight year old niece (for whom I bought this watch) has to wear it on the tightest hole and it still seems to be a little loose. She does actually like the large face of the watch, but her favorite part of this watch was the band (I admit that I too am a bit in love with the band of this watch). It is eye catching and so cute. The design is exactly as pictured, the color of pink might seem a little lighter (as with most things on the internet). My favorite thing about this watch is that it marks the minutes in fives making it easier for kids still learning how to tell time. The smaller clocks add a more mature look to the watch, but since they are only a design they seem to make it a little confusing for younger children. The watch is as simple as it can be to set up. I don't believe that the battery is replaceable though. Having a replaceable battery would be better because there is plenty of room for a child to grow into this watch. Overall, this is a great watch at a good price, but it is quite big.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased opinion. I always am honest with my reviews because when I read reviews I want to read honest ones. I hope this will help you with your shopping.

We live right next to the lake and have a pool a block away. We spend a ton of time swimming since the kids love it. I like having a nice variety of swim suits. This particular one appealed to me because I can wear it alone without a cover up. I didn't figure it would be one I'd want to swim it, but I could wear it out boating just in case I decide to swim or ski. Here are some brief thoughts:

-Bottoms: This fit pretty well. I ordered this in a large since I'm a size 8. I feel like a have a big bum, so since I could either go medium or large at my size, I went bigger. The shorts are too tight or too lose. The waistband is a little odd. There's elastic inside the band which shifts and flips, so when I'm taking them off or putting them on I have to make sure I don't let it shift. The color is much lighter than the picture, which was a bummer.
-Bra: This is the worst part of the suit. This has absolutely no support. The elastic on the bottom is super loose, so my breasts could potentially fall out. Maye I needed just this piece in a smaller size for my 36B chest. I will never wear this without the black tank, which is annoying since the versatility of either the top alone or with the black tank over gives me options.
-Tank: This is decent. It's cut nicely so you can see parts of the bra underneath.

-Material: This isn't the highest quality material, but given that it's $18.99 for three pieces I wouldn't expect extremely high quality material. The colors aren't nearly as bright in the one I received.

Overall, this won't be my go-to swimsuit, But it will be good for days that I want to take the kids to the pool and I'm not sure I want to get in. It leaves me covered a bit more when we're out boating as well. I am bummed that I can only wear it with the tank on, taking away the versatility of the outfit. I was sent this for testing and review purposes. That has no bearing on my rating or review of the swimsuit, this is my honest opinion.
summary: It's mediocre. It doesn't look bad, but the bikini top doesn't have any support at all.

It's comfortable. Only things I'd change are that the zipper actually takes out part of the image. And I wish there was one more zipper pocket on the inside. There are two small zipper pockets on the outside. Two deep open pockets under front flap and two open pockets on the inside that are made of the inner lining material. While they are all fine, sometimes things fall out of the inner pockets into the main bag. And everything is unorganized at the bottom.

reviewText:
The lingerie arrived on time and was packaged in a plastic bag. I wear a size 12 typically so based on the size chart I ordered a size Large. The fit was perfect. The material is stretchy so it will accommodate different top sizes. I'm a 36B bra size, and the top was very comfortable on me. There is padding in the top. Due to my smaller top size, I felt the padding didn't enhance my chest because the padding didn't act as a push-up. Also, the material on the bottom of the top is a red sheer material. I found the halter top to also be comfortable and didn't pull on my neck. The panties are made of very little material. The point isn't to have them on too long so they are good for short term wearing.
My husband liked this lingerie and it didn't stay on for very long. It definitely served its purpose.

Adorable babydoll that unfortunately runs rather small. Very becoming lace work that aligns the halter top part of this baby doll as well as the bust and the upper back. Along with this babydoll comes a matching G-string. The stitching is as good as you are going to get for this 65% cotton 35% polyester wear given the fact that it has a little stretch to it. I love the manner in which they treated the seam between the lacy bust and the empire cut chiffon materiala very cute babydoll that will definitely set the mood! reviewText: LOVE these.  They are so soft and comfortable, and they lay really nice. They are very flattering because of the "flow" and the length.  I am 5'8", 165lbs, and I ordered the large.  I usually wear a medium, but I didn't want to deal with the possibility of the wedgie which can happen with this material.  They sort of have a silky flow and hang like a skirt, so I don't think they add any visual weight by going up a size.  My waist is small in relation to my hips/butt, so they don't fall down.  If you are more of a straight figure, perhaps the larger size would slip down.  They fit me perfectly.  I had to cut about 1" off the length (which many reviews complained about them being so long... it is clearly written that the bottoms are unfinished to allow for desired length by trimming)  The material does not fray, and they sort of curl gently so they don't need a hem.  The extra length is the greatest feature! I have such a hard time finding pants that are long enough, especially when they are wide bottoms. They are so light and airy, and not at all see-through.  I plan on wearing them in the hot (90 degree) summer with a light t-shirt and I think they will make the hot days more comfortable.  I also bought them in other colors (prints and solids) and I love that I can wear them with flip flops for casual, a wedge sandal for a more chic look, or a heel and blouse for a dressy look. Just love them and recommend them! (pictured are the Burgundy Paisley)
summary: YES! versatile, comfortable and perfect for summer

So let me tell you what has happened with these pants-The fit is expected (I'm 5'2" and weigh 125 lbs) I'm a curvy lady so I got a size medium-which is my usual workout pant size and the fit was great and the pants looks great.  I actually was really looking forward to wearing these out and about. Then I go to my spinning class and these PANTS RIPPED IN THE CLASS!!! Please see the image provided. I was so disappointed not to mention embarrassed!  In addition, there is a run that goes from there all the way up to the back of the pants-basically the more I moved the more these pants ripped  They have zero give in terms of elasticity so if you are looking for cute workout pants to actually WORKOUT IN-THESE PANTS ARE NOT THE ONES! I wouldn't even trust them for normal walking around either. I also got an email from this company offering me a 50% off coupon on some other pants even before these pants had arrived-which I will not be using! I'm not even willing to pay 50% less for pants that ripped in class! Please do not waste your money on this poor quality clothing-learn from my mistake and just don't even bother with those company-clearly there is an issue that they have to even give coupons out for 50% off to sell their defective material. Now I'm out the cost of these pants and have to buy another pair-very disappointing.
summary: THESE PANTS RIPPED IN SPIN CLASS-BUYER BE WARE!

The shoe stretcher worked perfectly on one pair of shoes but not on another. I think the problem is the shoe not the stretcher. Highly recommend using stretcher but it may not always work depending on shoe.

I paid 50% more for just one stretcher (this one) as opposed to the one that's most popular because I wanted to pay extra for something that was well made. It did seem solidly built, but I didn't get to actually test it out because the little black corn/bunion plugs were missing altogether, so I had to return it. When it arrived, it was wrapped very haphazardly (not the Amazon box, but the contents within). Very disappointing.

This is a great shoe stretcher!!!! I've been looking at them for a while because I have a couple of pairs of shoes that need to be broken in and I just don't want blisters doing it. My sister has a stretcher and she offered it to me but it just weirds me out to share. I love that this includes little knobs to add to certain areas of the stretcher to stretch areas that you might need stretched. I am using the one at the big toe right now because one of my shoes rubs near my big toe. I have a pair of sperrys that are so cute. I bought them a little tight because leather stretches on its own over time. However, they aren't the most comfortable because I haven't broken them in yet. I am really glad that now I don't have to. The shoe stretcher will do it for me. I did receive this at a discount but that doesn't effect my opinion. I base my own purchases off of reviews so I value honesty. This didn't include instructions which would have been nice. It is pretty easy to figure out. It would be really nice if the little knobs were able to stay inside the shoe stretcher as well so it could all stay together nice. I am a size 7-7.5 and I ordered the womens M and it fits perfect!
summary: Great Shoe stretcher. I am a size 7-7.5 and womans M fits great!

reviewText: Great quality - especially like the snaps over the shoulder that allow for the neck to snug without having that huge fuss pulling the shirt over her head.  The color is just as represented.  Material fairly light weight.  Requires a T-shirt during winter but will be a nice spring shirt and keep the sun away.  Generous 2T

This shirt fit my niece good but was a bit small for a 2t on her but overall it felt like it was made of good material and the design on the front of the shirt was very bright and not faded. It also has two buttons on the side of one of the shoulders just in case there head doesn't fit you can make it a bit bigger which I like.

Im sassy and swear a lot so this is perfect for me when im feeling snarky. more than anything i got it to wear as a night shirt, The material itself is soft and comfortable feeling. Once stretched it is a little thin. Like if you have big chichis, someone takes a picture then can see bra or lack of lol. I put it on over a tank and could see the wording through it.  Sized smaller but still comfortable. I got the largest, think 3xl and was more like US xl/2xl. But still like it, just tighter than I'm comfortable with as far as my body type. I did get a discount for my honest review which is mine and mine alone.

I spent a lot of time reading reviews of other shoe stretchers here on Amazon.  I am happy with my purchase and I feel it is a quality stretcher, all metal and wood with nothing to break when under stress. I developed a bunion right after I just went though a  summer shopping spree at a shoe store, taking advantage of a friends a family discount offered on a well known shoe brand.  Although I saved a lot of money on the shoes it wasn't going to do me any good if they didn't fit well any more.  I bought some Moneysworth Best Shoe Stretcher liguid and used that with this stretcher with the bunion knob and it did the trick.  I was worried about putting too much stress on the shoe so I was probably conservative with my settings but after a few days the shoe was stretched sufficiently and I could wear the shoe without any discomfort.  Over all I am glad I chose this one because it will definitly hold up to all the shoes I still have left to stretch!
summary: If you have a darn bunion, give this a try.

reviewText: The metal piece in the back snapped almost instantly.  What a disappointment.

Works good

I had a shoe stretcher that belonged to my great grandmother; it has been around since 1958 and it still works great!  Only having one shoe stretcher stinks, I can only stretch one at a time. I have no idea why I my great grandmother only gave me one, who knows. Anyways, I figured it was time to add another one to my collection and finally be able two stretch two shoes at once. Therefore, once the new one arrived I decided to try them both on a new pair of sneakers that I have not worn yet. First, I used my older one on the left shoe, opened it all the way, and stretch it to the fullest. Then I took the new shoe stretcher, put it in the right shoe, and opened it to the fullest, but suddenly I heard something snap and the shoe stretcher it seemed like it was no longer stretching, no tension at all.  I then turned it back to the starting position and removed it from the shoe, only to find it in two pieces. Apparently, the piece of metal that holds the new stretcher together snapped apart. Wow, the piece of metal holding this stretcher together is very thin and not strong at all. The metal piece that holds my older one together seems like it is made from steel. I am disappointed in the quality of the metal they used to hold this stretcher together. Its seems like the rest of the stretcher is made from strong materials, not sure why they would use such a flimsy piece of metal. Oh well, I guess its back to one shoe stretcher for me. I received this product at a reduced price for my fair, honest, and unbiased review. All statements are my personal opinion gathered from my experience with this product.

Update: The merchant was kind enough to offer me a new one, Apparently I received a faulty product. I've been using the new one for about a week now and it is working great! I am now stretching out my sketcher sneakers with it and it has not broken. I am very pleased with the end result of product. Although I will not change my star rating, which is based of my first experience.  I would like to say, that I would in fact recommend this product, and I think it is wonderful that this merchant clearly stands behind their product.
summary: I Guess They Dont Make Things Like They Used To

Tip, try to use your tight shoes one day long and at the end of the day you fit the stretcher. By doing this you:

1. know exactly where your shoes need to be stretched
2. fit the tool while your shoes is slightly warm from your feet
3. fit the tool while your shoes is slightly humid from the use

Under these conditions the result is better than just fitting the tool on a cool dry leather without knowing exactly where to stretch

reviewText:
Class A No 1 construction: All working parts are metal to metal, ie. no threads in wood to strip out.  Beachwood, is a much harder, denser and close grained wood than either pine, which has soft and hard rings or cedar which is a much softer wood, ie. less strong and more prone to split and less likely to handle the mechanical stresses at the mechanical interfaces.  Miusco Shoe Stretcher for Length and Width is Very well designed, comes with clear instructions and is easy to use.  I have only 1 unfulfilled wish. the width stops short of being wide enough to stretch a size 10 D shoe, which is a men's standard width, a scotch wider.  ****
  Now for the missing 5th *  Injected molded sleeves similar to the point of discomfort small, black  inserts  to add a eighth more width to each halve would be relatively inexpensive to make and add a versatility not found in any other product of this nature that I have found.
  Do this at your own risk.  You can wrap them in stuff to add bulk to the width achieve similar results, but you must be careful when you do so to avoid bad consequences.  The 'stuff' must expand with the wooden toe pieces and not bind or you run the risk of damaging the tool and/or your shoes.
summary: 4 out of 5 *s.  I am very picky and they are very easy to use.

reviewText:
This product review is for Miusco Shoe Stretcher for Length and Width, Premium Solid Beech Wood.
The first thing you notice about this device is the quality of the construction. The wood is high grade, Beech Wood, the metal screw heavy gauge, reasonable leverage on the shoe. To work this device you simply screw it down to fit in the shoe. Depending on whether your attempting to widen or lengthen you twist 1) the handle will expand the front toe 2) the upper collar screw will expand the length. You cannot do both at the same time. You either widen or lengthen. On either operation the device has very broad capability. The problem is your shoe has to cooperate. On a regular womens shoe I would look for more than half a size. It the leather is pliable maybe a little more. You can buy a bottle of leather stretcher spray (water and alcohol) or steam the tight section over a kettle (my preferred method). Over time (hours) you can slowly and very incrementally re-tighten to get the shoe bigger. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
Please note that I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: Upon receiving this product I promptly yanked out my old laces and threaded these onto my shoes. The excitement was palpable! These are a "bungee cord" type material that is firm enough that it threaded through my particularly annoying shoes with ease! The ends do not fray as you are threading either. Once you have it on you put the round clip on both ends(this required a bit of finger strength to push the holes open enough to do this). Once it is tightened to your satisfaction, you cut the laces to match you and snap on the end piece. I kept mine a bit longer in case of swelling (I wasn't a boy scout but I could have been). I then per the instructions put the end clamp under the criss cross just below the clip and walked around for a while. The clamp holds the "strings" perfectly with no slipping.  I did some jogging and the shoes stayed put with no issues just as if I had real shoe laces.  I then did the ultimate test. When I got ready to take my shoes off, I did the unthinkable and put my toe on the back of the other shoe and slipped them off! They came right off without the insole coming with it and I didn't have to unlace my shoes! I LOVE INNOVATION! I highly recommend this product.
summary: No more tying shoes for me!

Cut the lace to the correct length and apply the snaps. It is so much easie for life with kids. The material is stretchy and seems to be durable. I would recommend this product!

reviewText:
I have personally never tried any no tie lock shoelaces before. This was my first pair. I started jogging a couple months ago and I think this is such a great idea! I saw a similar pair on a mom at the park and thought they looked interesting. So I just needed to order me a pair! I purchased these and was excited to recieve them in the mail. These worked great with my shoes. You don't need to worry about them not fitting because you cut them to work around you and your feet. The only small problem I had was that the instructions were a little unclear. It might be easy to understand after you have used them before, but I needed a little more help. These work great though and no more worrying about my shoe laces while I jog!

I recieved a discount code for this product in exchange for my unbiased and honest review.

Great product! Laced up the shoes with no problems. All the clamps worked great. You can make your laces super tight if you like. You can make your laces really loose if you like. When you tighten the laces and use the clamp, you laces will not lossen during the day. No matter how much walking or running you do the laces stay exactly where you set them. Packaging is ok. The package is really dark and it is really hard to read the instructions but it is basically self explanatory. No need to stop and retie laces during the day. Would be great for kids that do no know how to tie shoes yet. No need to tie big uncomfortable knots in you laces anymore. This product is excellent.

I got this product for free or deeply discounted for my honest and unbiased review. This review is 100% my own and I am in now way related to or affliated with this seller or company.

I am reviewing the No Tie Lock Shoelace for Kids and Adults. I got these for my 7 year old daughter. She can tie her shoelaces but she always stops all the time to tie them, Sometimes she forgets to put a extra tie in so they won't untie. We have never tried to wear any of the locking shoelaces. They worked great while we were outside and she did not have to keep running around and tying her laces. I chose the blue laces because they will go perfectly with her school uniform in the fall. The instructions on the back of the package was easy to read.and I did not have a problem installing, I had to trim it slightly but they were a great fit.

I received this item for free for my honest and unbiased review.
I love this top. It fits exactly as I would expect. It is a standard US size.

These are great for my little one who always had untied laces.  They were easy to install.  I had another set from another brand and I cut the extra part off too short, so make sure you don't do that .  You can tuck the excess in piece in the laces.  This came in nice packaging and was easy to put on her shoes.  It makes leaving the house so much easier since she can just slip on her shoes now.  The plastic part that moves down the elastic part sometimes is a little tight.  Maybe over time it will slide a little smoother.  Thanks for letting me try these for free to review.

This is one of those accessories that I tore into the moment the mail man was off the front porch!  As a big kid trying to get into shape (a less round shape, that is!) I have been putting a LOT of time into my shoes and the laces were...well, let's say they have been a bike chain casualty more than once.  I tore those raggedy old laces out and slid this thin bungee-cord type string right in, evened them up, slid on the cinch slider and snapped on the plastic end, pulled my shoes on and was SOOOOO happy with this choice!  Right off the bat I knew I wanted to shorten the cord and it was easy to pop the plastic end off, snip about an inch off the laces and then put the plastic end back on.  They look great in my runners and even have a reflective ribbon on them to help improve your night safety.  My 3 big kids are begging for sets of these too!
I did receive this product at no cost in return for my absolutely honest review.

Okay so I love these laces but their packaging needs a little improvement so I really wanted to call it 4 and a half stars but it wouldn't let me do a half.  The package shows pictures as the instructions, which in truth are very simple, but the images are very dark and it's difficult to see what the pictures are trying to show.  Basically, you remove the regular laces from your shoes and re lace them with these in the exact same way.  The only difference is that instead of tying them, you run the ends through the cord locks and leave as much excess as you prefer and cut off of the ends.  You then secure the two ends in the cord clips that keeps the ends locked in and secured neatly without fraying. I was able to put these in my shoes in a matter of just a few minutes.  I absolutely love the color; it matches the accents on my shoes perfectly.  The stretch laces are so much more comfortable on my feet than my regular tie laces were.  I frequently left my tied so I could slip them back on the next time, but then they were loose on my feet.  These laces let me slip them off and on  but keep them evenly snug to my feet.  There are any spots that are too tight or too loose with these.  I received this pair of laces free in exchange for sharing my honest unbiased review and I'm going to purchase a few more pair for my other running shoes.

This was the most GORGEOUS purse I have ever held in my hands!  True it is heavy, but it was like jewelry for your hands to hold!  Just holding it made me feel pretty!  The box it came in said a lot about how careful it was made.  The chain was flat and luxurious; not like other loop chains.  Little magnets help keep the purse closed.  The hinges on the bottom and the hinges on the top are very well made, with the top hinge flexible to go inside the purse if you do not want to use the strap. The only problem is that I have an iPhone 8 Plus and it was just a couple cm short of fitting in.  I wanted to keep it to wear to a black tie wedding, thinking I would not carry my phone, or have my husband carry my phone for me, but that would defeat the purpose of really what I needed it for...having a phone with me.  Then I almost considered getting a non-plus iPhone because that would fit.  My goodness, the things I had to think about just to keep this purse.  In the end, I returned it.  I took some photos, but could not get a photograph of how my iPhone Plus barely fit because of the fact I was using the phone to shoot photos.  I also found it $30 cheaper on  Fawziya's website, but then when you add shipping it comes close and I TRUST AMAZON more than any other website!  So there it is.  If I had a smaller phone I would have kept it and carried it to dinners and other not so formal parties.  It really is Exquisite!  Update: finally broke down and bought it again. I got so many compliments!  Worth the $ and not carrying a phone was not an issue!
summary: Absolutely Exquisite!  Feels like your Royalty holding it!
