I have used no tie laces in the past for my running shoes but I am using this pair for my cycling shoes.  I didn't necessarily want a pair of cycling shoes which required laces as it's very unsafe when riding but the shoes were so comfortable I purchased them anyway.  My concerns were solved when I started using these laces in them.  Not having to tie the shoes is convenient, but I'm happier with not having to worry about the laces getting lose and caught in my chain while riding.  My shoes are have standard eyelets and the laces were plenty long enough and I trimmed them to length once I found a good fit.  They are just a bit narrow compared to how they fit in my running shoes but so far it doesn't seem to be any issue.  Once the shoes are on, the laces have a slight amount of adjustment which is helpful as my feet tend to swell by the end of the day/ride.  I chose orange as I love bright colors but there were many colors available which would fit any need.  "I received this item for free in exchange for my honest opinion."
summary: These laces are great for athletics!

reviewText:
I got these for my preschooler's favorite sneakers. It was a complete pain to try to tie and double knot his laces. I wish I had gotten these sooner!
I liked all the color options, they were all fun colors and plenty to choose from. It would be easy to find a color that matched any shoe you had.
When we got them it took me maybe 5 minutes to unlace the old ones and put these new laces in. I like that they are completely adjustable. It would be as easy to have them fit in an adult shoe. There was more than enough lace leftover for this shoes. At the base of the shoe there is a holder that you can use to tighten or loosen the laces. It's a nice feature so that I can tighten them if I know he's going to be doing a lot of running or climbing, or leave them loose if we are just running errands. It also came with little guards for the ends so they look nice and clean, no laces dragging in the dirt!  Though my son can't put them on himself, he can easily take them off.
Overall I am very happy with them. My preschooler loves the bright color and we both like that putting his shoes on is so much faster!
I received this product at a reduced rate in exchange for my honest opinion.
summary: A must have for kid shoes!!

Sidefeel women's floral lace plus size top.  This shirt is made with polyester and spandex.  This shirt can be paired with leggings, jeans, etc.  It is fashionable and light weight.  I ordered the black color.  This shirt arrived early and was packaged well in a nice bag.  I laughed when I pulled it out.  I ordered an xxxl expecting it to be an xl or so.  I wanted a very loose top to pair with tight leggings and tight jeans.  This is a very snug top.  It is not an xl like I thought the xxxl would be.  I would say it's an m to l.  It's very short for being an xxxl.  The shirt is thin but soft.  I think it may fit better if it wasn't so short.  I can wear it but it's snug on the shoulders and chest and then too short for my style.  The lace requires that you wear a certain bra or a tank top.  I tried it with a tank top and actually liked the look.  The splash of color through the lace top and then on the bottom where the shirt is too short.  The tank top is longer than this shirt.  I can handle wearing it that way but I expected this shirt to be easier to wear by itself.  I can't even really alter this shirt as it doesn't have enough fabric to really do much with.  Overall I liked the shirt after I styled it with a tank top and gave up my dream of it being a nice loose flowy top.

reviewText:
PERFECT weightlifting shoe. I have totally flat feet (I'm Chinese and was raised a combination of barefoot and in flip-flops year round) and mangled toes from dance, and I hate shoes with "support" (aka weird lumps and bumps and corset-like constriction.) Most barefoot running shoes cost about a zillion dollars for no apparent reason, but if you wanted a thin rubber sole that is legal to wear at the gym because they won't let you work out barefoot or in ballet slippers, this is for you. Or so you can walk down the streets in NYC and not get glass in the bottom of your feet.

That's all this is. A thin rubber sole with spandex on top. Fits like a sock. If this is what you want and what you're expecting (and it was for me) it's like the perfect truely-barefoot running/workout/gym shoe for about 1/10th of the price.

Of course it's going to wear out, what $10 shoe isn't? You're going to blast right through them in a few months, but that's why I spend $10 and not $100. I blast right through expensive barefoot running shoes just the same.

I love these things! So many pros: They easily fit in my purse. No socks required. Impressive cushion for the thin sole. Wearable in water. Wearable on gravel!

I wear an 8.5 to 9 and got the XL, I might have done fine in the L. They look like socks, prepare for some stares!

reviewText: The material feels a little cheap

This is a wonderfully designed clutch that is absolutely perfect for a night out on the town. It is sized to hold the essentials, and easy to carry. I like it and would recommend to others.

Empty and folded over (snapped closed), this item is about 7.5 inches long, 3.75 inches from top to bottom, about 1/2 inches thick, and it weighs in just under 4 ounces (per our postal scale).  Unsnapped and laid flat, it doubles in height to about 7.5 inches too. Of course, you can stuff a lot of stuff into it to increase its thickness to and inch or more (depending on what you put inside).

The item we received was in the "Yellow" finished leather; it is more like Golden Mustard in color, instead of yellow, but it is outstanding looking just the same.

For a bag of this size, it sure has a good amount of space! The clutch has a large slide in pocket on each side; my HTC Droid DNA slips perfectly into either space, and paper money would fit well too. There is a small zippered pocket on the outside wall of one side that is just right for a small compact and a credit card, one side of the clutch also is made into a large zippered pocket that can hold a nice set of accessories. The inside has 12 slip-in pockets made perfectly for credit cards and on with a clear plastic window made for ID.

The entire clutch is nicely lined. The zippers are nice quality metal, and I have had no tracking issues at all... no snags. If I am able to keep my daughter from taking this clutch, I think it will be a clutch that I will be able to use for a long time. Nicely made, quality item. Well done.

The only opportunity i see is that a wristlet would have been nice, but that's not worth taking a star off for. Just a thought.

If you are looking for a clutch of this design, size, color, price and leather construction, for use as I have described above, then I would highly recommend giving this affordable clutch a try based on my experience with it so far.

Very recommended.

Go for it.

We received this item gratis from the manufacturer or a seller, without obligation, and decided to objectively test and review it. My statements in this Amazon listing review reflect that testing experience.
summary: Regsun Leather Billfold Clutch - Beautiful design - Lined - Perfect size - Yellow/Mustard color - Recommended

Lay witness. I am a man and I carry a purse.

Call it what you want if it makes you feel better about carrying one. But I like to call it what it is. A purse! :-)

It's well constructed of quality material. However, I did manage to break an interior zipper. That's the reason for taking off one star. It shouldn't have broken.

But it's stylish and holds a ton of stuff. So well worth this minimal investment. If you're interested in a purse, stop looking. This one is great and don't cost much. So, highly recommended whether you're considering your first purse or want to upgrade. Yes, I said upgrade. This is very high quality for such a reasonable price. MUCH higher quality than I anticipated. I expected to get something I'd have to return because it looked nice in the pictures, but it was obviously very cheap when you saw the actual product.

I'm happy to say that I'm happy with my purse. At the time of this review, I am 67 years old and had never carried a purse (or anything slightly resembling a purse). But if they would have had something like this when I was in my twenties, I likely would have started carrying one then! I can't say enough positive things about this item to do it justice. The only caveat, is mentioned in my sixth sentence. The worrisome part of that is, I did nothing special to break the zipper. I wasn't cramming a ton of stuff in or anything like that. I simply attempted to open it after closing it twice. That's right - The third trip of the zipper ended being its last. Not enough of a bother to return, as it's very functional without the zipper. And, as you can tell by my review, I actually like this bag. And you'll like it too! Quit reading and click that Add To Cart button before they discontinue this product or some other silly reason it's not for sale. You'll like it. And it will last for years to come.

I rubbed mine with some petroleum jelly for water-proofing purposes. You never know when you're going to set your purse down in a puddle of water or something. Made it a little darker. But not much difference. And the water protection makes it all worth while.

Thanks for reading. And enjoy your new purse! :)

reviewText:
Female here.
I'm going to break this down in to 3 categories: fit, look, and accessories.
1) Fit. I knew going into this that it would not fit exactly right because I am a female, but I was determined to make my cross-play come to life. I'm 5'7" 200 lbs, 42/38/44 with somewhat wide/built shoulders. That being said, the height was good with a little bit of bunching at my ankles, chest was a little tight, and arms and fingers were waay too long. I ended up partially "binding" my chest with 2 sports bras and a tank to keep them smushed in place. The mask was tight all around, almost impossible to see, and I could not get my wig to stay attached to it to save my life. I did end up buying a separate mask.
2) Looks. For this is was very simple. Closer to comic Deadpool, but it's not perfectly accurate. The red is a little brighter than expected. And because of having boobs, the chest did look a little strange to me, but the other parts to my cross-play covered the weird fit nicely.
3) Accessories. Admittedly, I did not use them for my cross-play. The holster probably won't do you much good as it seems too small to really hold any kind of toy gun or nerf. The belt pouches were okay, only a few inches deep, and would hold small objects like cards/money, the biggest one could hold my old Windows 720 without its case. The shoulder/back strap was just really confusing and seemed cheaply made. But again, I did not use these items, so I have no idea about wear and tear or comfort of the accessories.
Overall, it is an okay Deadpool suit. If it fits you well or you can alter it and make it work like I did, I think it's worth the money as a beginner suit or just a one time thing. If you want to become a full time cosplayer or want something really high quality, I suggest getting one custom made.

I'm a 5'4" woman who doesn't weigh a whole lot. I ordered the men's medium thinking that I'd have plenty of wiggle room. I was wrong. I ended up returning the costume for a men's large. When I received the large, I was excited that it fit. However, the right arm of the costume as sewn on completely backwards (instead of the hand facing the correct way, it is facing the opposite direction).
I don't plan on returning the large with the backwards hand simply because I'm going to be cutting the hands off of the costume anyways so that I can wear fingerless gloves instead (have to be practical for comicon).
Most people with this issue would probably rate this costume as a 2-star. However, there's not really anything else wrong with what I received. I know my way around a sewing machine, so the backwards arm isn't too big of an issue.

I purchased this Disney Star Wars BB-8 Rubber LED Watch for my 6 year old.  He likes Star Wars, always wants to know what time it is, and loves the feel of rubbery items so this seemed perfect.  He's a bit of a sensory seeker and having something close by to feel helps him stay on task and not end up chewing his fingernails or messing with his clothing.  He loved the watch for about a week, until where it bends on either side of the face started to crack and the top layer of paint came off.  Even though it's an orange and white watch, when it chipped, it now has a pink tinge to it and he won't wear it because he's afraid people will make fun of his pink watch. This tote bag is different from others as it has a zipper to close it. It also has a small open pocket on the back wall of the inside of the tote. Otherwise, it's designed much like your average tote. This is a well-made tote with no loose threads or seams. The stitching is straight. The bottom of the bag is sewn to expand the width of the tote. The handles are long enough to drape over your arm and you can hold it on your shoulder but the handles are just and inch or two too short to do so comfortably or for long periods.

The canvas fabric is strong and durable. This will be able to handle some weight. The printing of the giraffe and lettering is high quality. It shows no signs of peeling or fading. I like the imagery, I've always loved giraffes.  I think I would have liked the giraffe a little better had he not has a cigar. It's cute but I don't like normalizing smoking in front of my kids.

Note: The product listing's image shows the lettering mirrored. It's not like this in person. It reads left to right like it should.

Ratings (Out of five stars):
Material Quality: 
Zipper Quality: 
Print Quality: 
Capacity: 
Value: 

Overall rating: 25 out of 25 stars / 5 Star Average

 SUMMARY: This is a well made tote with no quality issues.
__________________________________________________________

I received this product complimentary from S.N.H for quality testing purposes. When I accept review opportunities the product must provide a practical use for my family. I don't guarantee favorable reviews, all opinions expressed are my own and based on my firsthand experience with the product. All of my reviews are written based on how I would feel as a purchaser of the product and what I would want to know before I made my purchase. I try to think of everything you might want to know but if you have any questions please leave me a comment. I will be happy to follow-up on my experience with this product.

This bag is the cutest! This durable canvas tote is very sturdy and well made. All of the seams are well sewn and reinforced. There were no loose or unraveling threads. This tote is spacious and can hold a lot of weight. It's great for a book bag, a craft project tote, or to take shopping so that you're not having to use plastic bags. I really like that the handles are long enough that I can carry the bag over my shoulder. I like that this material is machine washable and I can just toss the tote in the laundry when it needs cleaned. The design on front is cute and colorful. I was given this product at a discount for my honest, fair, and unbiased review.

This skirt looks basically just like it does in the picture, and the price denotes the quality. I absolutely love how this skirt looks, but don't so much love the quality and feel of it, which is why I've given it 3 stars. To be more specific:

QUALITY and MAKE:
The fabric of this skirt is thin and stretchy. It doesn't really feel "nice" or "soft" as you would hope for a skirt, but what shiny, scaley fabric really would? I won't machine wash this for fear of stripping the scales, because it looks like the type of fabric that will quickly wear away the sparkle and scale bits.
The elastic in the waistband feels cheap and doesn't have much stretch. I would worry about the elastic giving out within a few wears.
The hem of this skirt is unfinished. It's not stitched but instead just cut across, like they stitched a piece of fabric to an elastic band and figured they were finished. On the plus side, I pulled at it a bit to see if it frays, and so far so good!

FIT:
Follow the chart in the product pictures. They are true to size! I thought this skirt would be too tight, but it actually fits just right. :D

LOOK:
This skirt is really cute and fun. I got the black version because I wanted it to be at least slightly subtle (the others were so loud! but I also would have loved to rock them all) and I'll say that, while a shimmery, scaled skirt will never be subtle, it looks exactly as I expected. It will be fun to wear on nights out in the city, for example.

If this skirt were better made, it would have earned 5 stars from me. However, the quality (or lack thereof) really brings down my opinion. It's not falling apart, and really, it's what I was expecting from this, but it is a major factor.

reviewText:
I LOVE THIS NECKLACE! It is now one of my all time favorites! It has a really classy feel to it! It shipped from China but arrived weeks early so i was very pleasantly surprised. This is a must need for victorian costumes, gothic styles, or just everyday wear to make you feel great about yourself!

I got this Necklace at a discounted price.

I got this for my daughter who on occasion likes to dress up somewhat Gothic and I just knew that she would love this choker to add a little style to her black wardrobe and I was right, she loves it.  It is just right for her and it really looks fancy while at the same time it makes a great piece to draw attention to and talk about.  The embroidery is well done and the beading is very well placed and the design of the necklace is perfect in my daughters opinion.  The chain is adjustable about 2 1/2 inches so that it can be worn at different lengths or to accommodate a little bigger necks, but don't think it would fit comfortably any neck bigger than 15" without it feeling like it is actually choking them.  This isn't a piece she would wear for everyday, but it would be a great necklace for dressing up any plain black goth outfit.  It might look good as a wedding piece, but it all depends on the design and color of the dress, but would be a great piece for the Bridesmaids or maid of honor in most cases.  I received this necklace at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased opinion and my daughter loves it so that is why the 5 star review.

I was really thrilled with necklace. I had honestly expected something cheaply made, that would break or look awful and cheesy, something much like an item you would get in the Walmart Halloween aisle on sale. Something still kicking around the day after the holiday in a seventy-five percent off box. It was much better than I had expected, and it fact it was actually quite beautiful. The lace is soft, and well made, and is ornately stitched ( The packaging on the necklaces states that the necklace is actually hand made.)the beads and the large center broach are attached securely, and the clasp of the necklace is actually metal, which actually surprised me quite a bit and is also adjustable with several loops to hook the clasp into. I put this on and loved it, and my husband actually not only noticed it, but told me that he liked it, which is quite a feat. The necklace is a great length, coming down to about my collar bone, and would be perfect paired with a corset for Halloween, or Cosplay. I would not hesitate to wear this item out in public.  All in all, I am happy with this purchase, and would not hesitate to buy from this seller in the future.

reviewText: I bought this scarf for my daughter in law as a gift.  Her favorite color is yellow and I thought she would like this scarf.  It took a long time to arrive but it stated that when I ordered it.  It was worth the wait.  The scarf is very lightweight and delicate.  The colors and design a beautiful.  I know my daughter in law will love it.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  I try to be objective and relate my experiences and opinions on the products I receive.

There many different color scarves to choose from and I chose the purple one. It was definitely a toss up between the purple one and blue one. I went ahead with the purple one.

I was not sure what it was when it arrived because it was so nicely packaged. It came in a fairly long and well padded envelope. Great care was given when this scarf was both packaged and delivered.

I originally started wearing the scarf as a scarf on my head but realized that it also felt nicely around my neck. It is not overbearing and the cloth is not heavy. On the inside of the scarf it says 100% Silk Feeling Polyester. When people think of polyester they think of heat and hot but this is not so with this scarf. It is very comfortable to wear.

There are so many different ways to put on a scarf. If you are looking for new ways to put on a scarf and or just how to put it on then please check out YouTube.

Before I forget I want to comment on the print. There is a colorful print flower on the scarf. The colors are pink, light blue and a mixture of that of either a dark blue and or dark purple. Not one color stands out more than the other and that is what also makes this scarf very unique. Each color on the scarf holds its own with respect to the other colors. There is a flower on each end of the scarf. While wearing the scarf the flowers don't stand out immediately but yet blend in nicely with the rest of the colors on the scarf.

This is truly indeed a very elegant scarf that is bound to stand out in beauty wherever you go.

I love it and it's definitely a keeper.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This scar is really quite pretty. The picture on my computer looks more pastel in color than the scarf I recieved. Which has more vibrant colors but either way I like the look.

The feel of the scarf itself is nice. It is very delicate and soft but It is not real natural silk, it is 100% polyester silk. The title and description are kind of deceiving because the do not differentiate this fact but when you look at the price it should be obvious it is not natural silk.

Overall the scarf is one that I enjoy wearing.

I need to disclose that I recieved this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. My review for this product is in no way influenced my the fact that I recieved this product at a discount.
summary: Beautiful but polyester and not natural silk

reviewText:
I had been looking for a cute skirted swimsuit and this one is really pretty! I like the polka dot design, shirrings, and bow designs. The swimsuit is very feminine and modest without looking old lady-ish.  The best part about the swim suit is that it is two pieces!  It looks like a typical swim dress to a bystander, but has a separate swim panty that makes it super easy for those bathroom breaks.  I normally would not wear a two piece that does not cover my bottom, and the swim bottom would be way too skimpy for me to have anyone "see" it, but because of the long top / dress like swim suit design, you are completely covered. The swim suit has a flattering halter neck (or you can remove the straps for a strapless look), and the bust cups are padded.  I have a large bust, and there is no way I could wear this strapless, though.  It was a little difficult adjusting the top to keep the girls in when it was tightly fastened as it was!

The biggest issue I have with the swimsuit is that the sizing is off.  I ordered a size larger than normal, and it is still quite tight, and a little shorter than I expected in the torso.  The material is a little thin as well, but since I don't swim all that often, it shouldn't be an issue and I doubt it would wear out before I am ready for something new.  Shipping is slow but arrived as indicated -  as it is coming from overseas - so be sure to plan ahead when ordering.

I have provided an honest and unbiased review based on my personal experience with this product. I am not affiliated with the company in any way and my star rating is based on my personal experience and use of the product.
summary: Super cute two piece design.  Runs small!

These are nice shorts for biking. The bright color makes them easy to find in a drawer. Most exercise shorts fit right over them and you can't tell you have bike shorts on underneath. They wash easily in the washing machine. There is no need for special detergents. I also used fabric softener and they came out of the wash just fine. I placed them in the dryer on a normal load cycle and they came out just fine. I would recommend these to anyone that does not have a gel padded bike seat. They provide comfort as well as support while riding. They do not chafe or itch your legs. They are easy to put on and simple to remove. reviewText: This umbrella is very nice and sturdy. We had a big rain storm few days ago and I was glad that I had this umbrella with me. It is pretty big as we were able to fit two people underneath with no problems. The color is universal and could be used by men and women. I have a lot of 'unique' underwear, but never in my life had I seen anything like this before.  Quite the novelty!

I like them.  The stitching is solid, and they seem like they'll last for a while.  Much more comfortable than I expected.  I think a lot of that has to do with the way the pouch was designed, and they did an excellent job there.

Believe it or not, I actually did have some trouble getting them on properly the first time.  The elastic bands on the open side kept getting all tangled up on me, and once that happened it was confusing trying to figure out what goes where.  It just required taking them off and having a bit of patience.

For the price, I'd say these are well worth it.  I did receive a discount for the purpose of this review.  For what they're selling for now, you couldn't get anything like this for even CLOSE to this price in a novelty store.  It's worth the wait on the shipping.
summary: Cool idea, and well worth the modest price

I ordered and reviewed Sagton Men's Sexy Cotton Underwear Elastic Classic Low-Rise Soft Boxer Briefs (XL, Black) I compared the Sagton to 2(X)IST in that review. I would put these briefs up against those same 2(X)IST. The cotton quality is right up with the 2(X)IST and the sewing is even better. You will see that Sagton on the crotch uses three line seams where 2(X)IST only uses two. The front pouch is double lined and soft. The sides and back are strong but thin light weight almost see through if held up to the light. I have washed and worn these for a month and they look like they will last longer than most briefs. The comfort is outstanding. These compare to briefs that cost $20-$24. Of course the only issue with these is the long wait in shipping of 4 to 6 weeks. I will be ordering more.

This coat will fit into it's own jacket pocket for those wondering for backpacking even though it also come with its own separate pouch.  The problem is the zipper will be on the inside so you have to work a little bit to zip it closed.  That said I have done it and it packs away nicely for backpackers.  I'd say it is a legit 40 degree coat.  If you are using it inside an ultralight sleeping bag as a secondary layer, you'll be happy with it.  I have been using it this fall in the mountains.  It's been getting down to about 30 at night and this doesn't cover that by itself.  I eventually have to layer under this coat to keep warm.  That said, it has allowed me to keep an ultralight bag with me though and I wear the coat at night.  Sitting by the fire it's perfect. I haven't had any issues with down pulling through the coat at all.  I bought this for $39 and its worth it.  Ther reason for the one less star is the packability issue.  I do wish it was easier to close the pocket zipper once the coat is stuffed into the pocket.

Summary: Decent quality down jacket with stuff sack - after converting sizing, the medium I received was about half a size larger than expected. Quality of the jacket was good - very smooth, light nylon shell with an adequate amount of fill. I wear a size medium jacket - I have a Patagonia down vest and hooded down jacket, as well as a medium Marmot technical shell. This was an Asian 2XL, considered comparable to a US medium, and it fit just a touch larger than expected. The chest was larger by perhaps 2-3", the sleeves fit very well and the body was a touch long. No elastic on the waist, so you will get a draft there. I am 5'11", 175 lbs, and wear a 16-34 dress shirt. Free/discounted sample provided for evaluation. My goal is an honest and informative review. If you have any questions or comments, please let me know!
summary: Decent down jacket, fit is about 1/2 size larger than expected....

reviewText:
This is an average quality t-shirt with a twist.  The shirt fits as expected.  The graphic gets a lot of laughs from family members and friends.  I enjoyed wearing it nightly while watching the RNC!  The quality of the graphics is actually quite good and still looks great after multiple washings.  And the picture of DJT is very realistic.  Maybe this will be a collector's item in a few years.

I bought this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

This t-shirt is very good quality.  It is 100% high quality cotton and true to size.  I was surprised just how thick it was.  It washed very well.  No fading or pulling. Very minimal shrinking.  The print and graphic are not just iron-on, they are good quality.  I bought this for my husband but my teenage daughter has stolen it.  It is one of her favorite shirts.  We get many laughs and comments whenever we are out in public.  Very funny shirt that makes light of this crazy election.  I was given this at a discount for my honest review.

This t-shirt is a hoot!  I bought it as a joke and probably will wear it as a joke.  It is 100% cotton and hecho en Mexico/made in Mexico even though the back of the t-shirt says made in China underneath the American flag.  To me this says let's lighten up America!  Someday, this shirt will be amazing memorabilia for a definitely different election.  This is truly meant to elicit smiles and not hatred or disentangle no matter which side you are on.  It is a high quality cotton. It fits true to size and as it is 100% cotton, expect some shrinkage.  This is a must have for collectors of election memorabilia for sure!  If you wear it remember to smile and laugh!

I purchased this shirt at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion of the shirt.
summary: A reason to smile and laugh, for every collector!

I bought this dress for my mom and she loves it. If you go with the right size, you're going to have a beautiful, elegant new outfit in your wardrobe, perfect for many social settings in the summer and spring.

The item arrives in good condition, without any bad odor stemming from it. You can iron it before use as it may have gotten wrinkled but it doesnt need ironing every time. It is very flattering and the skirt has a lot of volume. Adding that to the A-line cut, this dress gives you a unique, feminine shape.

This dress does not have a lot of stretch and isn't really forgiving. So beware! SIZE UP! To give you an example, my mom is 57 and measures 39-31-39. The size XL (12/14) fits her perfectly ending mid-thigh. I ordered one in pink for her first in a size Large but she couldn't zip up. So if you are on a RANGE of SIZE like 0 to 2, or 6 to 8, go with the BIGGER NUMBER.

The material is sturdy and very elegant, making the dress look fresh and the colors alive. The skirt has fantastic volume too! Seriously, this is one classy beauty that is a must for all you classy ladies!
summary: youre going to have a beautiful, elegant new outfit in your wardrobe

reviewText:
This dress is so gorgeous! I was honestly expecting something of less quality because of the price, the location it was shipping from and the material. But, I am so surprised to have a unique and fun dress to wear to an upcoming Dr. Seuss themed event. I ordered style A001, with the paint splashes on the front and back. The white material is so gorgeous. It has an embossed look and is basically off-white on white paisley pattern. My Honey says the white reminds him of upholstery but I love it because it reminds me of old Gunny Sack dresses. The colors are more varied and much more vibrant than the photo does it justice. The splash of color on the front goes above and below the waist seam. There is a splash of color on the back but it is smaller and only from the waist seam down. It is lovely.
The material is really soft, but it is very firm and has no stretch. I went by the measurements listed in the product photos and that made me the largest size available, a size 8. (I laid down one of my favorite dresses that is similar and measured the dress like the product description instructed.) I am usually a 4-6 in dresses so this was surprising. Now, I have a history of buying Amazon clothing from China and the sizes almost always run really small compared to US sizes, so I was not alarmed at ordering an 8. It took a really long time to get here, but I ordered many months in advance of the event. I think it took about a month. I arrived folded up but still neat considering how far it traveled.
The fit is absolutely perfect on me and fits to my measurements!! I am so happy that this is a successful purchase because this dress is the absolute perfect dress for my event. I am a colorful person and this is going to really highlight that part of me and make me feel like a trendsetter with it's uniqueness.
I plan to dry clean the dress to give it a seamless shape and then I will be wearing a light, white petticoat underneath. This will fill out the billowy skirt, add some length and hide my undercarriage when I bend over. *wink* This is one of my favorite purchases on Amazon ever. I will come back and attach photos of it laying flat and being worn.
I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. When I shop on Amazon, I rely heavily on the reviews of others to make my purchasing decisions. Because of this, I try to always leave a helpful or informative review.
summary: Gorgeous! I love this dress. Size 8 fits my size 6 body.

However, I can't stop him from trying to bite/chew on anything (I guess this makes him more comfortable from teething). I couldn't wait to give this bib with teether a try when I saw it.
I like the look of the bib and I am happy to say that my son loves it too. He wears it and at first he couldn't figure out what's the "green part" of the bib but after like 10-15 mins, he starts to chew on it and seems to enjoy it a lot.
I touched the teether part by my hand and I feel its safe to let baby chew on it. It's listed as BPA free and non-toxic, which is a must for baby. Also it's not rough at all so it won't hurt baby's mouth.

** I have received this product at a discounted price. My review is honest and unbiased solely based on my experience using the product.
summary: A fantastic bib for teething/drooling babies
